function expireCookie(cookieName, path) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + ";Domain=" + current_domain +";path="+ path + "; expires=Wed, 11 May 2015 00:47:28 GMT";
}

function setCookie(cookieName,expireDate) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + "; expires=" + expireDate;
}

function setExpireDate(days) {
  var expireDate = new Date();
  var expireTime = expireDate.getTime();
  expireTime += days*24*60*60*1000;
  expireDate.setTime(expireTime);
  return expireDate.toUTCString();
}

          infoDiv.append(infoText3);
          infoDiv.append(infoText4);

            }, 200);
          }

      });
    }

function expireBlrchCookie(cookieName) {
  document.cookie = cookieName + "=; expires=Wed, 11 May 2015 00:47:28 GMT";
}

function setsBlrchCookie(cookieName,expireDate) {
  document.cookie = cookieName + "=true; expires=" + expireDate;
}

function setExpireDate(days) {
  var expireDate = new Date();
  var expireTime = expireDate.getTime();
  expireTime += days*24*60*60*1000;
  expireDate.setTime(expireTime);
  return expireDate.toUTCString();
}

(function() {
  // Check for old cookie
  var regex = new RegExp("cookie_" + test_segment_name + "\\s*1[^=]*");

  var cookie_match = document.cookie.match(regex, "$1"); 

  var old_cookie = cookie_match ? cookie_match[0] : null;

  if(old_cookie !== cookie_name) {
    // Expire old cookie
    expireBlrchCookie(old_cookie);
    // Set new cookie and expire in 90 days
    setsBlrchCookie(cookie_name, setExpireDate(90));
  }
}());

// get query parameters
function getParameterByName(name) {
  var url = window.location.href;
  var regex = new RegExp("[?&]" + name + "(=([^&#]*)|&|#|$)");
  var results = regex.exec(url);
  if (!results) { return null; }
  if (!results[2]) { return ''; }
  return decodeURIComponent(results[2].replace(/\+/g, " "));
}

// set cookie
function setCookie(name, value, dom, days, https_only, path) {
  var date;
  var expires = "";
  var secure = "";
  var domain = "; domain=" + dom;
  var cookiePath = "";

  if (days) {
    date = new Date();
    date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
    expires = "; expires=" + date.toGMTString();
  }
  
  if (https_only) {
    secure = "; secure";
  }
  
  if (path) {
    cookiePath = "; path=" + path;
  }
  
  if (name && value) {
    document.cookie = name + "=" + value + domain + secure + expires + cookiePath;
  }
}

// get cookie
function getCookie(name) {
  var match = document.cookie.match(new RegExp('(^| )' + name + '=([^;]+)'));
  if (match) return match[2];
}

// get TID and BID parameters to activate
var tid = getParameterByName('TID');
var bid = getParameterByName('BID');

if (/^([A-Za-z0-9-_]{4})*([A-Za-z0-9-_]{2,3})$/.test(bid)) {
  
  // prepare bid for base64 extraction
  var transformedBagId = bid.replace(/-/g, '+').replace(/_/g, '/');
  switch (transformedBagId.length % 4) {
    case 2:
      transformedBagId += '==';
      break;
    case 3:
      transformedBagId += '=';
      break;
    default:
  }
  
  // break out ids
  var message = window.atob(transformedBagId);
  if (message) {
    var j = message.split(':', 1)[0];
    var u = message.split(':', 2)[1];
    var p = message.split(':', 3)[2];
  }
  
  if (/^([a-f0-9-]{36})$/.test(j) && /^([A-F0-9]{32})$/.test(u) && /^([\w\d]+)$/.test(p)) {
  
    // determine domains
    var hostname = window.location.hostname;
    var oneLevelUp = hostname.substring(hostname.indexOf(".") + 1);

    // get existing mktUniversalPersist
    var existingmktUniversalPersist = getCookie('mktUniversalPersist');
    
    // set cookies
    setCookie('JSESSIONID', j,'.'+oneLevelUp, 729, true, '/');
    setCookie('unknownShopperId', u+'|||', '.'+oneLevelUp, 729, false, '/');
    setCookie('unknownShopperId', u+'|||', '.'+hostname, 729, false, '/buy');
    
    // do not set or prepend another mktUniversalPersist value 
    // if already present at start of string 
    var pattern = new RegExp('^('+p+').*$');
    if (existingmktUniversalPersist && !pattern.test(existingmktUniversalPersist)) {
      setCookie('mktUniversalPersist', p+'%26'+existingmktUniversalPersist, '.'+oneLevelUp, 729, true, '/');
    } else if (!existingmktUniversalPersist) {
      setCookie('mktUniversalPersist', p, '.'+oneLevelUp, 729, true, '/');
    }

    // refresh for cookies to take effect
    if (tid) window.location.replace('/buy/shopping_bag.do');
  }
}

            var truefitScript = document.createElement('script');
            var tfDomain = wcdTrueFitOrderConf.tfEnvironment == "staging" ? "ony-staging-consumer.truefitcorp.com" : "ony-consumer.truefitcorp.com";
            var customerIdParam = customerId !== "" ? "userid=" + customerId + "&" : "";
            truefitScript.type = 'text/javascript';
            truefitScript.src = "https://" + tfDomain + "/fitrec/" + clientId + "/track_checkout?" + customerIdParam + "orderid=" + orderId;
            document.querySelector("body").appendChild(truefitScript);

                console.info('TrueFit - loading script : ' + truefitScript.src);

function expireBlrchCookie(cookieName) {
  document.cookie = cookieName + "=; expires=Wed, 11 May 2015 00:47:28 GMT";
}

function setsBlrchCookie(cookieName,expireDate) {
  document.cookie = cookieName + "=true; expires=" + expireDate;
}

function setExpireDate(days) {
  var expireDate = new Date();
  var expireTime = expireDate.getTime();
  expireTime += days*24*60*60*1000;
  expireDate.setTime(expireTime);
  return expireDate.toUTCString();
}

(function() {
  // Check for old cookie
  var regex = new RegExp("cookie_" + test_segment_name + "\\s*1[^=]*");

  var cookie_match = document.cookie.match(regex, "$1"); 

  var old_cookie = cookie_match ? cookie_match[0] : null;

  if(old_cookie !== cookie_name) {
    // Expire old cookie
    expireBlrchCookie(old_cookie);
    // Set new cookie and expire in 90 days
    setsBlrchCookie(cookie_name, setExpireDate(90));
  }
}());

var utils = window.optimizely.get('utils');
utils.waitForElement('.main-logo').then(function() {
  function showUpgradeModal() {
    function browserPopUpModal(){
      gap.UniversalModal.publishModal({
        modalSize: 'standard',
        actionSheet: 'small'
      });
      return false;
    }
    var runModal = utils.poll(function(){
      if(gap.UniversalModal.publishModal.length > 0){
        runModal();
        browserPopUpModal();
        modalContent = document.querySelector('#iframe').remove();
        modalContent = document.querySelectorAll('.modal--content');
        modalContent[0].classList.add('browserUpdateMsg');
        htmlToModal = document.querySelectorAll('.browserUpdateMsg');
        htmlObject = '<div class="browserWrapper tx_center pd_all_sm"><h3 class="sp_top_sm sp_sm tx_center sds-cb_font--primary sds-cb_display-a">Update Your Browser</h3><p class="sds-cb_font--seasonal sds_font-size--22 sp">To view and purchase items on our site, you’ll need the current version of one of these browsers.</p><div class="actionImg sds_grid-root tx_center"><div class="sds_g-1-3"><img src="//www.gap.com/optimizely/5c9f3c7ebe824f1abc0a649c31441e9c.jpg" alt="update to chrome"><div class="sds-cb_font--primary sds_font-size--16 pd_all_sm">chrome</div><a target="_blank" href="https://www.google.com/chrome/" class="sds_button_primary sds_button_inline sds_font-size--11">update</a></div><div class="sds_g-1-3"><img src="//www.gap.com/optimizely/990254a571874624bb5581dafc2fb691.jpg" alt="update to firefox"><div class="sds-cb_font--primary sds_font-size--16 pd_all_sm">firefox</div><a target="_blank" href="https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/update-firefox-latest-version" class="sds_button_primary sds_button_inline sds_font-size--11">update</a></div><div class="sds_g-1-3"><img src="//www.gap.com/optimizely/77353fcd5a1e46bcb29b48671aa9e15d.jpg" alt="update to edge"><div class="sds-cb_font--primary sds_font-size--16 pd_all_sm">edge</div><a target="_blank" href="https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/microsoft-edge" class="sds_button_primary sds_button_inline sds_font-size--11">update</a></div></div></div>';
        htmlToModal[0].innerHTML = htmlObject;
      }
    },1000);
  }

  locAgent = navigator.userAgent;
  var regExTest = new RegExp(/Edge\/(\S+)|Firefox\/(\S+)|Chrome\/(\S+)/gmi);
  browseVers = locAgent.match(regExTest)[0].split('/');
  var edgeBrowser = locAgent.indexOf("Edge") > -1;

  hasSeenUpgradePopup = sessionStorage.getItem('userHasSeenUpgradePopup');

  if (edgeBrowser) {
    var edgeVersionToUpgrade = locAgent.split(" ");
    for (i = 0; i < edgeVersionToUpgrade.length; i++) {
      if (edgeVersionToUpgrade[i].indexOf("Edge") > -1) {
        var edgeVersionNum = parseInt(edgeVersionToUpgrade[i].substring(5));
        if (edgeVersionNum < 16) {
          showUpgradeModal();
          sessionStorage.setItem('userHasSeenUpgradePopup', 'yes');
        }
      }
    }
  } else if ((browseVers[0] == "Chrome" && parseInt(browseVers[1]) < 64) || (browseVers[0] == "Firefox" && parseInt(browseVers[1]) < 60)) {
    // Show upgrade browser popup
    if (hasSeenUpgradePopup !== 'yes') {
      showUpgradeModal();
      sessionStorage.setItem('userHasSeenUpgradePopup', 'yes');
    }
  }

});

    }
}

// get query parameters
function getParameterByName(name) {
  var url = window.location.href;
  var regex = new RegExp("[?&]" + name + "(=([^&#]*)|&|#|$)");
  var results = regex.exec(url);
  if (!results) { return null; }
  if (!results[2]) { return ''; }
  return decodeURIComponent(results[2].replace(/\+/g, " "));
}

// set cookie
function setCookie(name, value, dom, days, https_only, path) {
  var date;
  var expires = "";
  var secure = "";
  var domain = "; domain=" + dom;
  var cookiePath = "";

  if (days) {
    date = new Date();
    date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
    expires = "; expires=" + date.toGMTString();
  }
  
  if (https_only) {
    secure = "; secure";
  }
  
  if (path) {
    cookiePath = "; path=" + path;
  }
  
  if (name && value) {
    document.cookie = name + "=" + value + domain + secure + expires + cookiePath;
  }
}

// get cookie
function getCookie(name) {
  var match = document.cookie.match(new RegExp('(^| )' + name + '=([^;]+)'));
  if (match) return match[2];
}

// get TID and BID parameters to activate
var tid = getParameterByName('TID');
var bid = getParameterByName('BID');

if (/^([A-Za-z0-9-_]{4})*([A-Za-z0-9-_]{2,3})$/.test(bid)) {
  
  // prepare bid for base64 extraction
  var transformedBagId = bid.replace(/-/g, '+').replace(/_/g, '/');
  switch (transformedBagId.length % 4) {
    case 2:
      transformedBagId += '==';
      break;
    case 3:
      transformedBagId += '=';
      break;
    default:
  }
  
  // break out ids
  var message = window.atob(transformedBagId);
  if (message) {
    var j = message.split(':', 1)[0];
    var u = message.split(':', 2)[1];
    var p = message.split(':', 3)[2];
  }
  
  if (/^([a-f0-9-]{36})$/.test(j) && /^([A-F0-9]{32})$/.test(u) && /^([\w\d]+)$/.test(p)) {
  
    // determine domains
    var hostname = window.location.hostname;
    var oneLevelUp = hostname.substring(hostname.indexOf(".") + 1);

    // get existing mktUniversalPersist
    var existingmktUniversalPersist = getCookie('mktUniversalPersist');
    
    // set cookies
    setCookie('JSESSIONID', j,'.'+oneLevelUp, 729, true, '/');
    setCookie('unknownShopperId', u+'|||', '.'+oneLevelUp, 729, false, '/');
    setCookie('unknownShopperId', u+'|||', '.'+hostname, 729, false, '/buy');
    
    // do not set or prepend another mktUniversalPersist value 
    // if already present at start of string 
    var pattern = new RegExp('^('+p+').*$');
    if (existingmktUniversalPersist && !pattern.test(existingmktUniversalPersist)) {
      setCookie('mktUniversalPersist', p+'%26'+existingmktUniversalPersist, '.'+oneLevelUp, 729, true, '/');
    } else if (!existingmktUniversalPersist) {
      setCookie('mktUniversalPersist', p, '.'+oneLevelUp, 729, true, '/');
    }

    // refresh for cookies to take effect
    if (tid) window.location.replace('/buy/shopping_bag.do');
  }
}

function expireBlrchCookie(cookieName) {
  document.cookie = cookieName + "=; expires=Wed, 11 May 2015 00:47:28 GMT";
}

function setsBlrchCookie(cookieName,expireDate) {
  document.cookie = cookieName + "=true; expires=" + expireDate;
}

function setExpireDate(days) {
  var expireDate = new Date();
  var expireTime = expireDate.getTime();
  expireTime += days*24*60*60*1000;
  expireDate.setTime(expireTime);
  return expireDate.toUTCString();
}

(function() {
  // Check for old cookie
  var regex = new RegExp("cookie_" + test_segment_name + "\\s*1[^=]*");

  var cookie_match = document.cookie.match(regex, "$1"); 

  var old_cookie = cookie_match ? cookie_match[0] : null;

  if(old_cookie !== cookie_name) {
    // Expire old cookie
    expireBlrchCookie(old_cookie);
    // Set new cookie and expire in 90 days
    setsBlrchCookie(cookie_name, setExpireDate(90));
  }
}());
  
// END React check
}

function setsBlrchCookie(cookieName,expireDate) {
  document.cookie = cookieName + "=true; expires=" + expireDate;
}

function setExpireDate(days) {
  var expireDate = new Date();
  var expireTime = expireDate.getTime();
  expireTime += days*24*60*60*1000;
  expireDate.setTime(expireTime);
  return expireDate.toUTCString();
}

(function() {
  // Check for old cookie
  var regex = new RegExp("cookie_" + test_segment_name + "\\s*1[^=]*");

  var cookie_match = document.cookie.match(regex, "$1"); 

  var old_cookie = cookie_match ? cookie_match[0] : null;

  if(old_cookie !== cookie_name) {
    // Expire old cookie
    expireBlrchCookie(old_cookie);
    // Set new cookie and expire in 90 days
    setsBlrchCookie(cookie_name, setExpireDate(90));
  }
}());

var current_domain = '.gap.com';

function expireCookie(cookieName, path) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + ";Domain=" + current_domain +";path="+ path + "; expires=Wed, 11 May 2015 00:47:28 GMT";
}

function setCookie(cookieName,expireDate) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + "; expires=" + expireDate;
}

function setExpireDate(days) {
  var expireDate = new Date();
  var expireTime = expireDate.getTime();
  expireTime += days*24*60*60*1000;
  expireDate.setTime(expireTime);
  return expireDate.toUTCString();
}

  window.IS_STYLITICSOCP_INITIALIZED = false;

  var wcdStyliticsOrderConf = {
    init: function() {
      // Gather order total, product IDs and order ID for dom element data attributes
      if(utag !== undefined && utag.o !== undefined && utag.o["gapinc.usgap"] !== undefined && utag.o["gapinc.usgap"].sender !== undefined && utag.o["gapinc.usgap"].sender[2] !== undefined && utag.o["gapinc.usgap"].sender[2].data !== undefined && utag.o["gapinc.usgap"].sender[2].data.data !== undefined && utag.o["gapinc.usgap"].sender[2].data.data.id !== undefined && utag.o["gapinc.usgap"].sender[2].data.data.br_product_short_sku !== undefined && utag.o["gapinc.usgap"].sender[2].data.data["br_net_demand_total"] !== undefined){
        var orderTotal = Math.round(utag.o["gapinc.usgap"].sender[2].data.data["br_net_demand_total"]);
        var productIds = utag.o["gapinc.usgap"].sender[2].data.data.br_product_short_sku.join();
        var orderId = utag.o["gapinc.usgap"].sender[2].data.data.id; 

        wcdStyliticsOrderConf.callStyliticsCode(orderTotal, productIds, orderId);
      }
    },
    callStyliticsCode: function(orderTotal, productIds, orderId) {
      var styliticsScript = document.createElement('script');
      styliticsScript.type = 'text/javascript';
      styliticsScript.src = "//widget.stylitics.com/pixel.js?data-client=bananarepublic&data-order-total=" + orderTotal + "&data-ids=" + productIds + "&data-order-id=" + orderId;
      document.querySelector("body").appendChild(styliticsScript);
      console.info('Stylitics - loading script : ' + styliticsScript.src);
    }
  };

  var utils = optimizely.get("utils");
  utils.waitUntil(function () {
    return window.utag !== undefined && window.utag.o !== undefined && window.utag.o["gapinc.usgap"] !== undefined && window.utag.o["gapinc.usgap"].sender !== undefined && window.utag.o["gapinc.usgap"].sender[2] !== undefined && utag.sender[2].data.data.page_type == "OrderConfirmation";
  }).then(function () {
    console.log('wcd:utag ready');
    if (window.IS_STYLITICSOCP_INITIALIZED !== true) {
      window.IS_STYLITICSOCP_INITIALIZED = true;
      //using timeout because not all cookies (customerId) exists immediately for some reason
      var temp = setTimeout(wcdStyliticsOrderConf.init, 1);
    }
  });
}

// changing card copy popup

function copyChange() {
  var spcCardCopy = {
    "BRCARD":{
      "copy":"Use your Banana Republic card.",
      "img":"//www.gap.com/optimizely/b5ce095b82d746e19597501761ed652f.jpg"
    },
    "NAVYIST":{
      "copy":"Use your Navyist by Old Navy card.",
      "img":"//www.gap.com/optimizely/03aca52d35a9483fa1eeff8e3daf4cba.jpg"
    },
    "MYCARD":{
      "copy":"Use your Gap Silver card.",
      "img":"//www.gap.com/optimizely/baa6c4d233994698bcfb9a838551e6dd.jpg"
    },
    "LUXE":{
      "copy":"Use your Banana Republic Luxe card.",
      "img":"//www.gap.com/optimizely/13f27f79ccf84964ba2caf8c8e8aab4e.jpg"
    }
  };
  setTimeout(function(){
    //wait for promo applies
    var promosApplied = document.querySelectorAll('.applied-promo');
    // console.info(promosApplied);
    for(var j = 0; j < promosApplied.length; j++) {
      // console.info(promosApplied[j]);
      if(promosApplied[j].closest('.applied-promo-with-flyouts').querySelector('.ng-scope.ng-binding') !== null){
        promosApplied[j].closest('.applied-promo-with-flyouts').querySelector('.ng-scope.ng-binding').innerHTML = "<div class='cardAsset'><img src="+spcCardCopy[promosApplied[j].textContent].img+" alt='card icon'></div><div class='cardCopyA'>Select <strong>Checkout</strong> to redeem this promo.</div><br><span class='cardSpcCopy'>"+spcCardCopy[promosApplied[j].textContent].copy+"</span>";

      } else {
        //console.info('returning null');
      }
 			var flashFix = document.querySelectorAll('flyout');
      for(var k = 0; k < flashFix.length; k++) {
        flashFix[k].style.display = 'block';
      }
    }
  },700);
}

var utils = window.optimizely.get('utils');
utils.waitForElement('.apply-button').then(function(elem){
  copyChange();
  elem.addEventListener('click',function(){
    copyChange();
  });
  document.querySelector('.promotion-input').addEventListener('keypress',function(e){
    var key = e.which || e.keyCode;
    if (key === 13) { // 13 is enter
      copyChange();
    }
  });
});

var mutationObserver = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
  mutations.forEach(function(mutation) {
    // console.log(mutation);
    var clsbtn = document.querySelectorAll('.xGrayIcon');
    for(var j = 0; j < clsbtn.length; j++){
      clsbtn[j].addEventListener('click', function(){
        // console.info('something new');
        copyChange();
      });
    }
  });
});
utils.waitForElement('#shopping-bag-promo-box').then(function(muteElem){
  // var targetELem = getElementById('shopping-bag-promo-box');
  mutationObserver.observe(muteElem, {
    //attributes: true,
    //characterData: true,
    childList: true,
    subtree: true,
    //attributeOldValue: true,
    //characterDataOldValue: true
  });
});

function expireCookie(cookieName, path) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + ";Domain=" + current_domain +";path="+ path + "; expires=Wed, 11 May 2015 00:47:28 GMT";
}

function setCookie(cookieName,expireDate) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + "; expires=" + expireDate;
}

function setExpireDate(days) {
  var expireDate = new Date();
  var expireTime = expireDate.getTime();
  expireTime += days*24*60*60*1000;
  expireDate.setTime(expireTime);
  return expireDate.toUTCString();
}

  // Check for old cookie
  var regex = new RegExp("CavSegment=[^;]*");

  var cookie_match = document.cookie.match(regex, "$1");

    expireCookie(cookie_name, '/');

  }
}());

}

function getCookie_dpg(cookieName, cookieVal) {
  var splitCList = cookieList_dpg.split('; ');
  var custId = 'undefined';
  var custTriggered = 'false';

  for(var i = 0; i < splitCList.length; i++) {

      var us_cv = splitCList[i].split('=')[1];

        //delete cookie
        document.cookie = splitCList[i].split('=')[0] + '=; path=/; domain=.gap.com; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT;';

        jQuery(document).on('customerId:assigned',function(){
          jQuery(document).ready(function() {
            setTimeout(function(){
              var trackVal = 'deleted_'+cookieName+'_cookie_'+cookieVal+'_on_'+location.href+'_for_customerId_'+custId;
              wcdLib.trackValue(this, trackVal, trackVal, 'eVar6');
            },2000);
          });
        });
      }
    }
    //get customer Id if available
    if(splitCList[i].indexOf('customerId') > -1) {
      console.info(splitCList[i].split('=')[1]);
      custId = splitCList[i].split('=')[1];
      jQuery(document).trigger('customerId:assigned');
      custTriggered = 'true';
    }
  }
  if(custTriggered == 'false') {
    jQuery(document).trigger('customerId:assigned');
  }
}

var cookie_name = 'CavSegment=original';
var current_domain = '.gap.com';

function expireCookie(cookieName, path) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + ";Domain=" + current_domain +";path="+ path + "; expires=Wed, 11 May 2015 00:47:28 GMT";
}

function setCookie(cookieName,expireDate) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + "; expires=" + expireDate;
}

function setExpireDate(days) {
  var expireDate = new Date();
  var expireTime = expireDate.getTime();
  expireTime += days*24*60*60*1000;
  expireDate.setTime(expireTime);
  return expireDate.toUTCString();
}

(function() {
  // Check for old cookie
  var regex = new RegExp("CavSegment=[^;]*");

  var cookie_exists = cookie_match ? cookie_match[0] : undefined;

  if(cookie_exists) {

    // Expire cav if it exists cookie
    expireCookie(cookie_name, '/browse');
    expireCookie(cookie_name, '/');
    expireCookie(cookie_name, '/buy');
  }
}());

else if (window.experiments.search === "BloomReach") test_segment_name = 'br';
else test_segment_name = 'control';

var test_version =  ' 1';
var cookie_name = 'cookie_' + test_segment_name + test_version + traffic_allocation;

function expireBlrchCookie(cookieName) {
  document.cookie = cookieName + "=; expires=Wed, 11 May 2015 00:47:28 GMT";
}

function setsBlrchCookie(cookieName,expireDate) {
  document.cookie = cookieName + "=true; expires=" + expireDate;
}

function setExpireDate(days) {
  var expireDate = new Date();
  var expireTime = expireDate.getTime();
  expireTime += days*24*60*60*1000;
  expireDate.setTime(expireTime);
  return expireDate.toUTCString();
}

(function() {
  // Check for old cookie
  var regex = new RegExp("cookie_" + test_segment_name + "\\s*1[^=]*");

  var cookie_match = document.cookie.match(regex, "$1"); 

  var old_cookie = cookie_match ? cookie_match[0] : null;

  if(old_cookie !== cookie_name) {
    // Expire old cookie
    expireBlrchCookie(old_cookie);
    // Set new cookie and expire in 90 days
    setsBlrchCookie(cookie_name, setExpireDate(90));
  }
}());

var cookie_name = 'CavSegment=original';
var current_domain = '.gapfactory.com';

function expireCookie(cookieName, path) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + ";Domain=" + current_domain +";path="+ path + "; expires=Wed, 11 May 2015 00:47:28 GMT";
}

function setCookie(cookieName,expireDate) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + "; expires=" + expireDate;
}

function setExpireDate(days) {
  var expireDate = new Date();
  var expireTime = expireDate.getTime();
  expireTime += days*24*60*60*1000;
  expireDate.setTime(expireTime);
  return expireDate.toUTCString();
}

(function() {
  // Check for old cookie
  var regex = new RegExp("CavSegment=[^;]*");

  var cookie_match = document.cookie.match(regex, "$1"); 

  var cookie_exists = cookie_match ? cookie_match[0] : undefined;

  if(cookie_exists) {
    //setCookie(cookie_name, setExpireDate(1));    
    // Expire cav if it exists cookie
    expireCookie(cookie_name, '/browse');
    expireCookie(cookie_name, '/');
    expireCookie(cookie_name, '/buy');
  }
}());

function expireCookie(cookieName) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + ";Domain=" + current_domain +";path=/; expires=Wed, 11 May 2015 00:47:28 GMT";
}

function setCookie(cookieName,expireDate) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + ";Domain=" + current_domain +";path=/; expires=" + expireDate;
}

function setExpireDate(days) {
  var expireDate = new Date();
  var expireTime = expireDate.getTime();
  expireTime += days*24*60*60*1000;
  expireDate.setTime(expireTime);
  return expireDate.toUTCString();
}

(function() {
  // Check for old cookie
  var regex = new RegExp("CavSegment=[^;]*");

  var cookie_match = document.cookie.match(regex, "$1"); 

  var old_cookie = cookie_match ? cookie_match[0] : null;

  if(old_cookie !== cookie_name) {
    // Expire old cookie
    expireCookie(old_cookie);
    // Set new cookie and expire in 1 days
    setCookie(cookie_name, setExpireDate(1));
  }
}());
}}]}, {"viewId": "11397787742", "changes": [{"dependencies": [], "type": "custom_code", "id": "B357963F-673B-4330-BAB9-048B4A00E4F1", "value": function($){var cookie_name = 'CavSegment=all';
var current_domain = '.gapfactory.com';

function expireCookie(cookieName) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + ";Domain=" + current_domain +";path=/; expires=Wed, 11 May 2015 00:47:28 GMT";
}

function setCookie(cookieName,expireDate) {
  document.cookie = cookie_name + ";Domain=" + current_domain +";path=/; expires=" + expireDate;
}

function setExpireDate(days) {
  var expireDate = new Date();
  var expireTime = expireDate.getTime();
  expireTime += days*24*60*60*1000;
  expireDate.setTime(expireTime);
  return expireDate.toUTCString();
}

(function() {
  // Check for old cookie
  var regex = new RegExp("CavSegment=[^;]*");

  var cookie_match = document.cookie.match(regex, "$1"); 

  var old_cookie = cookie_match ? cookie_match[0] : null;

  if(old_cookie !== cookie_name) {
    // Expire old cookie
    expireCookie(old_cookie);
    // Set new cookie and expire in 1 days
    setCookie(cookie_name, setExpireDate(1));

function setExpireDate(days) {
  var expireDate = new Date();
  var expireTime = expireDate.getTime();
  expireTime += days*24*60*60*1000;
  expireDate.setTime(expireTime);
  return expireDate.toUTCString();

// Disable Optimizely is visitor is recognized as a bot
// This mimics the logic in Gap's scode file
var optlyGapRef = document.referrer;
var optlyGapRefFlag = document.cookie;
if (optlyGapRefFlag.indexOf('gap_ref') != -1) {
	window.optimizely.push({
		type: "disable"
	});
}
else if (optlyGapRef === "http://gap.com/") {
	window.optimizely.push({
		type: "disable"
	});
}

// Store the visitor's current site as an attribute
window.optimizely.push({
  "type": "user",
  "attributes": {
    "site": document.location.hostname
  }
});

// Temporary code to store Adobe Analytics IDs

window.optlyGetCookie = function(name) {
  var value = "; " + document.cookie;
  var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
  if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
};

window.optlyGetAdobeId = window.setInterval(function(){  
	var adobe_id = window.optlyGetCookie('s_vi');
  if (typeof adobe_id !== "undefined") {
  	//console.log('[Optly / Custom] Adobe Analytics ID is: ' + adobe_id);
    
    // store adobe_id as an event
    window.optimizely.push({
	  	"type": "event",
      "eventName": "storedAAID"
    });
    
    window.optimizely.push({
	  	"type": "event",
      "eventName": adobe_id
    });
    
    clearInterval(window.optlyGetAdobeId);
  } else {
  	//console.log('[Optly / Custom] Adobe Analytics ID not yet defined');
  }
},1000);


/*
 * Custom Adobe Analytics integration tools
 */

// Initialize Optimizely array and other variables.
//window.optimizely = window.optimizely || []; // already initialized
var isLogEnabled = false;

// Log function to help with debugging custom integration.
function integrationLogger(message) {
  if(isLogEnabled) {
    console.log('[Optimizely - Custom Integrator]: ' + message);
  }
}

// Determines if entity has a `single_experiment` policy.
function isExperiment(data) {
  if (data.campaign.policy === "single_experiment") {
    integrationLogger(data.campaign.name + " is a single experiment.");
    return true;
  } else {
    integrationLogger(data.campaign.name + " is NOT a single experiment.");
    return false;
  }
}

// Determines if entity passes audiences conditions.
function passesAudiences(data) {
  if (data.decision.variationId !== null) {
    integrationLogger(data.campaign.name + " has passed audience conditions.");
    return true;
  } else {
    integrationLogger(data.campaign.name + " has failed audience conditions.");
    return false;
  }
}
  
// Determines if entity passes traffic allocation.
function passesTrafficAllocation(data) {
  if (data.decision.isCampaignHoldback !== true) {
    integrationLogger(data.campaign.name + " has passed traffic allocation.");
    return true; 
  } else {
    integrationLogger(data.campaign.name + " has failed traffic allocation.");
    return false;
  }
}

// Retrieves the variation name for a given experiment. Only works for `single_experiment` policies.
function getVariationName(data, variationID) {
  var variationName = "";
  for (var variation in data.campaign.experiments[0].variations) {
    if (data.campaign.experiments[0].variations[variation].id === variationID) {
      variationName = data.campaign.experiments[0].variations[variation].name;
      integrationLogger("Variation name is: " + variationName);
      return variationName;
    }
  }
}

// Populates experimentArray with relevant experiment data.
function populateVariable(campaignName, variationName) {
  integrationLogger("Populating experimentArray for: " + campaignName);
  integrator.experimentArray.push({campaignName: campaignName, variationName: variationName});
}

var integrator = {
  
  experimentArray: [],
	
  // Collects relevant experiment data.
  registerExperiments: function(data) {
    if (isExperiment(data) && passesAudiences(data) && passesTrafficAllocation(data)) {
			var campaignID = data.decision.campaignId;
      var campaignName = data.campaign.name;
      var experimentID = data.decision.experimentId;
      var variationID = data.decision.variationId;
      var variationName = getVariationName(data, variationID);
      populateVariable(campaignName, variationName);
    }
  },
  
  // REDIRECT: Collects relevant experiment data on redirects.
  registerRedirectExperiments: function(data, state) {
    if (state.getRedirectInfo() !== null) {
      var redirect_campaign = state.getCampaignStates({visitorRedirected: true});
      var campaignName = "";
      var variationName = "";
      var integrationSettings = {};
			for (var key in redirect_campaign) {
      	campaignName = redirect_campaign[key].campaignName;
        variationName = redirect_campaign[key].variation.name;
      }
      populateVariable(campaignName, variationName);
    }
  }
};

// Extends the `optimizely` object with the custom integrator script.
// USAGE: optimizely.get("custom/integrator");
window.optimizely.push({
  type: "registerModule",
  moduleName: "integrator",
  module: integrator
});

// Listen for campaignDecided events, then execute handler.
window.optimizely.push({
  type: 'addListener',
  filter: {
    type: 'lifecycle',
    name: 'campaignDecided',
  },
  handler: function(event) {
    integrationLogger('Campaign Decided Event for ' + event.data.campaign.name);
    var integrator = optimizely.get("custom/integrator");
    integrator.registerExperiments(event.data);
  }
});

// REDIRECT: Listen for pageActivated events, then execute handler. campaignDecided events aren't sent on redirected page.
window.optimizely.push({
  type: "addListener",
  filter: {
    type: "lifecycle",
    name: "pageActivated"
  },
  handler: function(event) {
    var state = optimizely.get('state');
    if (state.getRedirectInfo() !== null) {
    	integrationLogger("Redirect detected.");
      var integrator = optimizely.get("custom/integrator");
  		integrator.registerRedirectExperiments(event.data, state);
    }
  }
});

if (document.location.search.indexOf('coetest=true') > -1) {
  var createCookie = function (name, value, days) {
    var expires = '';
    var domain = document.location.host.substring(document.location.host.indexOf('.'));
    if (days) {
      var date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
      expires = '; expires=' + date.toUTCString();
    }
    document.cookie = name + '=' + value + expires + ';domain=' + domain + ';path=/';
  };

  createCookie('coetest', 'true', 1);
}

 *   setABCookie();
 * });

 * })();

  fetchData: function() {
    var data = {audiences: [], badges: []};
    if (localStorage.getItem("tealium_va")) {
      try {
        var visData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('tealium_va'));
        if (visData.audiences) {
          for (var id in visData.audiences) {
            if (visData.audiences.hasOwnProperty(id)) {
              data.audiences.push(id);
            }
          }
        }
        if (visData.badges) {
          var badges = visData.badges;
          for (var id in badges) {
            if (badges.hasOwnProperty(id) && badges[id]) {
              data.badges.push(id);
            }
          }
        }
        window["optimizely"].push(["storeThirdPartyData", "tealium", data]);
      } catch (e) {}
    }
  }

    }
  }
  })(extension);
            var decisionString = window.optimizely.get('state').getDecisionString({campaignId: campaignId});

// Public Methods
var adobeIntegrator = {
	// Array of objects for active campaigns/experiments
	campaignArray: [],
	// Accepts "s" variable as a param and assigns campaigns/experiments to list.
	assignCampaigns: function(sVariable) {
    sVariable.list1 = sVariable.list1 || [];
		for (var i = this.campaignArray.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
      var campaignString = sanitizeString(this.campaignArray[i]);
      sVariable.list1.push(campaignString);
			this.campaignArray.splice(i, 1);
		}
	},
	// Accepts "s" variable as a param and assigns eVars to object, then dispatches custom link tracking.
	trackDelayedCampaigns: function(sVariable) {
    sVariable.list1 = sVariable.list1 || [];
    sVariable.linkTrackVars += ",list1";
		for (var i = this.campaignArray.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
      var campaignString = sanitizeString(this.campaignArray[i]);
			sVariable.list1.push(campaignString);
			this.campaignArray.splice(i, 1);
		}
    sVariable.tl(true, "o", "OptimizelyLayerDecision");
	}
};

// Removes special characters and spaces from decisionString.
function sanitizeString(string) {
	var result = string.replace(/[^A-Z0-9:()]/ig, "_");
  return result;
}

// Scopes `campaignArray` to Optimizely object.
if (window.optimizely.get("custom/adobeIntegrator") === undefined) {
	window.optimizely.push({
		type: "registerModule",
		moduleName: "adobeIntegrator",
		module: adobeIntegrator
	});
}

// Failing Audiences returns `null`, failing Traffic Allocation returns `undefined` for decisionString.
if (!!decisionString) {
	window.optimizely.get("custom/adobeIntegrator").campaignArray.push(decisionString);
}

          }
        }
      ],
      trackLayerDecision: function(decisionData) {
        var extension = decisionData.integrationSettings && decisionData.integrationSettings['custom_adobe_analytics_integration'];
        if (!extension) {
          return;
        }
        var campaign = {
          id: decisionData.layerId,
          name: decisionData.layerName,
          policy: decisionData.layerPolicy,
          integrationStringVersion: decisionData.integrationStringVersion,
        };
        var campaignId = campaign.id;
        var experimentId = decisionData.experimentId;
        var variationId = decisionData.variationId;
        var isHoldback = decisionData.isLayerHoldback;
        extension.$fieldDefaults = [];
        (function(widg) {
  var i = 0;
  var field;
  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {
    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];
    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(extension);
        var decisionString = window.optimizely.get('state').getDecisionString({campaignId: campaignId});

// Public Methods
var adobeIntegrator = {
	// Array of objects for active campaigns/experiments
	campaignArray: [],
	// Accepts "s" variable as a param and assigns campaigns/experiments to list.
	assignCampaigns: function(sVariable) {
    sVariable.list1 = sVariable.list1 || [];
		for (var i = this.campaignArray.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
      var campaignString = sanitizeString(this.campaignArray[i]);
      sVariable.list1.push(campaignString);
			this.campaignArray.splice(i, 1);
		}
	},
	// Accepts "s" variable as a param and assigns eVars to object, then dispatches custom link tracking.
	trackDelayedCampaigns: function(sVariable) {
    sVariable.list1 = sVariable.list1 || [];
    sVariable.linkTrackVars += ",list1";
		for (var i = this.campaignArray.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
      var campaignString = sanitizeString(this.campaignArray[i]);
			sVariable.list1.push(campaignString);
			this.campaignArray.splice(i, 1);
		}
    sVariable.tl(true, "o", "OptimizelyLayerDecision");
	}
};

// Removes special characters and spaces from decisionString.
function sanitizeString(string) {
	var result = string.replace(/[^A-Z0-9:()]/ig, "_");
  return result;
}

// Scopes `campaignArray` to Optimizely object.
if (window.optimizely.get("custom/adobeIntegrator") === undefined) {
	window.optimizely.push({
		type: "registerModule",
		moduleName: "adobeIntegrator",
		module: adobeIntegrator
	});
}

// Failing Audiences returns `null`, failing Traffic Allocation returns `undefined` for decisionString.
if (!!decisionString) {
	window.optimizely.get("custom/adobeIntegrator").campaignArray.push(decisionString);
}

      },
      serializeSettings: JSON.stringify,
      deserializeSettings: JSON.parse,
    });

   height: 460px;	}  .optly-modal-content img {  	max-height: 420px;  }}#modalSuccess{  display:none;  color:#000d42;}.exit_confirm_email{  display:none;}.optly-content-left {  margin-top:1rem;}@media (min-width: 768px) {	.optly-content-left {		margin-top: 0%;	}}.optly-header-container {	height: auto;}.optly-main-header {  background: #fff;  top: 0;  position: initial;  padding-right: 0;}/* headline font*/@media (min-width: 768px) {  .optly-main-header {  	font-size:2rem;  }}@media (min-width: 1024px) {  .optly-main-header {  	font-size:2.5rem;  }}.optly-lighter {	font-weight: normal !important;  text-transform: none;}.optly-bolder {	font-weight: bold !important;}.optly-divider {	height: 12px;  background-color: #000;  margin-top: .85rem;  width: 100%;  position: absolute;}.optly_email-container {	display: block;}.label-container { 	flex: 1;}.input_optly {  font-size: 17.072px;  height: 44px !important;  width: 100%;  margin-bottom: .5rem;}@media (min-width: 768px) {	.input_optly {		margin-bottom: 0;	}}.optly_button-container {	padding-left: 0rem;  white-space: nowrap;}@media (min-width: 569px) {	.optly_button-container {		margin-top: .75rem;    	}}.optly-textme { text-align: center;}@media (min-width: 569px) {	.optly-textme {    text-align: left;  }}.optly-terms { 	color: #666;  position: absolute;  bottom: 1rem;  width: 100%;  text-align: center;  left: 0;  text-decoration: underline;}@media (min-width: 569px) {	.optly-terms {    text-align: left;    left: 1.5rem;  }}.validationWarning {	color: #ff0000;	font-weight: bold;}';
document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(widget._styleTag);
        //if( location.search.indexOf("popupTest=true") > -1 ) {

jQuery(document).ready(function() {
	if( location.pathname != "/buy/shopping_bag.do" && location.pathname.indexOf("/checkout/place-order/") == -1 && location.pathname != "/checkout/order.do" && location.pathname != "/checkout/orderConfirm.do" && location.hostname.indexOf("secure") == -1 && typeof wcdLib !== "undefined" && typeof wcdLib.documentReady !== "undefined" && typeof wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar !== "undefined" && typeof wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar !== "undefined" && typeof wcdLib.hasLocalStorage !== "undefined" ) {

		var _settings = {
	    shownOnce: false
	  };

	  var actionlnk = widget.actionLink;
	  var optlyEventTrackingExit = '';

	  jQuery('body').append(widget.$html);

	  jQuery('.optly-modal-background, .optly-modal-close').bind('click', function() {
	    hidePopup();
	  });

	  var cookieDomain = (location.hostname.indexOf('gidapps')>-1) ? '.gidapps.com' : '.gap.com';
	  var emailpopExpireTime = gidLib.getFutureDate({'days':'30'});
	  /* making generic for cookie read/write*/
	  var golCookie = '';
	var golLS = "";
	  var emailCardStatus = '';
	  var cookieName = '';
	  var isUserSignedIn = gidLib.getCookie("customerId") != "" ? true : false;
	  var suppressedModal = false;

	// If cookie is present and local storage supported, set cookie name/value to LS so we can remove cookie from whitelist
  if(location.host.indexOf("onol") > -1 || location.host.indexOf('oldnavy') > -1) {
    // value = 1
		cookieName = 'ONOL_hasSeenEmailpopUS';

  	golCookie = gidLib.getCookie( cookieName );
		if( golCookie != 0 && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() ) wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar( cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime );
		golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar( cookieName );

    emailCardStatus = 'ON';
    var hasTIDparam = gidLib.getQuerystringParam('ev');
    if( hasTIDparam != "" ) {
    	suppressedModal = true;
    }
    optlyEventTrackingExit = 'ON';

  }

  else if(location.host.indexOf("brol") > -1 || location.host.indexOf('bananarepublic') > -1){
    // value = true
		cookieName = 'BROL_hasSeenEmailAquisition';

    golCookie = gidLib.getCookie( cookieName );
		if( golCookie != 0 && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() ) wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar( cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime );
		golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar( cookieName );

    emailCardStatus = 'BR';
    optlyEventTrackingExit ='BR';

  }

  else if(location.host.indexOf("gol") > -1 || location.host.indexOf('www.gap.com') > -1){
    // value = true
		cookieName = 'GOL_has_seen_modal';
    emailpopExpireTime = gidLib.getFutureDate({'days':'14'});

    golCookie = gidLib.getCookie( cookieName );
		if( golCookie != 0 && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() ) wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar( cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime );
		golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar( cookieName );

    emailCardStatus = 'GP';
    var hasTIDparam = gidLib.getQuerystringParam('tid'); //suppress from emails
		var getTIDstring = hasTIDparam.substr(0, 4);
    if(getTIDstring == 'gpem'){
      suppressedModal = true;
    }
    optlyEventTrackingExit = 'GP';
  }

  else if(location.host.indexOf("atol") > -1 || location.host.indexOf('athleta') > -1){
    // value = 1
		cookieName = 'AT_hasSeenEmailpopUS';

		golCookie = gidLib.getCookie( cookieName );
		if( golCookie != 0 && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() ) wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar( cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime );
		golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar( cookieName );

    emailCardStatus = 'AT';
    optlyEventTrackingExit = 'AT';
  }

	  var testAttributeValue = '';


	  if (widget.injectionType == "exit") {

	    jQuery('body').mouseleave(function(e) {

	      var unvData = personalizationService;
	    if(unvData && unvData.model.personalizationData && unvData.model.personalizationData !== null){
	        if(unvData.model.personalizationData.hasOwnProperty('personalizationInfoV1')&&	(unvData.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1!==null)){
	          var unvDataInfo = unvData.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1;
	          if(unvDataInfo && unvDataInfo.hasOwnProperty('featureSelections') && unvDataInfo.featureSelections!==null && typeof unvDataInfo.featureSelections!=='undefined'){
	            if(unvDataInfo.featureSelections.hasOwnProperty('Evergreens') && unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens !==null && typeof unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens!=='undefined' ){
	              var unvSeg = unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens;
	              if(!Array.isArray(unvSeg)){
	                  unvSeg =[unvSeg];
	              }
	              if(unvSeg.length > 0){
	                for(var i=0;i< unvSeg.length; i++){
	                  if(unvSeg[i].AttributeName ==='EMAILUS'){
	                    testAttributeValue = unvSeg[i].AttributeValue;

	                  }
	                }
	              }
	            }
	          }
	        }
	    } // end of personalization

	      if(e.clientY < 0){
        if (!_settings.shownOnce && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() && golLS !== "true" && testAttributeValue.indexOf(emailCardStatus) == -1 && !isUserSignedIn && !suppressedModal && jQuery(window).width() > 767) {
	          _settings.shownOnce = true;
	          showPopup();
	          var newOmniEventname = widget.popUp_Fired +'_PopUpFired';
	          //trackValue(this,newOmniEventname,newOmniEventname,'eVar6');
	          wcdLib.trackValue(this,newOmniEventname,newOmniEventname,'eVar6');
	        }
	      }
	    });

	  }

	  /* adding idle block of code */
	  else if(widget.injectionType == "idle"){
	  	var idleState = false;
	  	var idleTimer = null;
	  	var fireModalOnIdle = false;
	  	jQuery('*').bind('mousemove click mouseup mousedown keydown keypress keyup submit change mouseenter scroll resize dblclick', function () {
	    	clearTimeout(idleTimer);
	      if (idleState === true) {
	        //console.log('reset');
	        fireModalOnIdle = false;
	      }
	    	idleState = false;
	      idleTimer = setTimeout(function () {
	        fireModalOnIdle = true;
	        idleState = true;
        if (!_settings.shownOnce && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() && golLS !== "true" && testAttributeValue.indexOf(emailCardStatus) == -1 && !isUserSignedIn && !suppressedModal && jQuery(window).width() > 767) 	{
	            _settings.shownOnce = true;
	            showPopup();
	            var newOmniEventname = widget.popUp_Fired +'_PopUpFired';
	          	wcdLib.trackValue(this,newOmniEventname,newOmniEventname,'eVar6');
	          //console.log('fire');
	        }
	      }, widget.idleTimeWait);
	  	});

	  	jQuery("body").trigger("mousemove");
	  }

	  /* start of product view count*/
	  else if(widget.injectionType == "pdpView"){
	    jQuery('body').mouseleave(function(e) {
	      if(e.clientY < 0){
	      	var prodViewCnt = gidLib.getCookie('GPProductViewCount');
	    		prodViewCnt = Number(prodViewCnt);
      	if (!_settings.shownOnce && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() && golLS !== "true" && testAttributeValue.indexOf(emailCardStatus) == -1 &&  !isUserSignedIn && !suppressedModal && jQuery(window).width() > 767 && (prodViewCnt > widget.pdpViewCount ||prodViewCnt == widget.pdpViewCount )){
	          _settings.shownOnce = true;
	          showPopup();
	    		}
	      }
	    });
	  }
	  /*end of PD view count logic*/

	  /* end of idle mouse logic */
	  else {
	    jQuery(document).ready(function() {

	      var unvData = personalizationService;
	    if(unvData && unvData.model.personalizationData && unvData.model.personalizationData !== null){
	        if(unvData.model.personalizationData.hasOwnProperty('personalizationInfoV1')&&	(unvData.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1!==null)){
	          var unvDataInfo = unvData.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1;
	          if(unvDataInfo && unvDataInfo.hasOwnProperty('featureSelections') && unvDataInfo.featureSelections!==null && typeof unvDataInfo.featureSelections!=='undefined'){
	            if(unvDataInfo.featureSelections.hasOwnProperty('Evergreens') && unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens !==null && typeof unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens!=='undefined' ){
	              var unvSeg = unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens;
	              if(!Array.isArray(unvSeg)){
	                  unvSeg =[unvSeg];
	              }
	              if(unvSeg.length > 0){
	                for(var i=0;i< unvSeg.length; i++){
	                  if(unvSeg[i].AttributeName ==='EMAILUS'){
	                    testAttributeValue = unvSeg[i].AttributeValue;

	                  }
	                }
	              }
	            }
	          }
	        }
	    } // end of personalization

    if (!_settings.shownOnce && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() && golLS !== "true" && testAttributeValue.indexOf(emailCardStatus) == -1 && !isUserSignedIn && !suppressedModal && jQuery(window).width() > 767) {
	        _settings.shownOnce = true;
	        showPopup();
	      }
	    });

	  }

	  function showPopup() {
	   // document.cookie = "has_seen_modal=true";
    //gidLib.setCookie(cookieName,'true',emailpopExpireTime ,'/',cookieDomain);
		wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar( cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime );
	    jQuery('.optly-modal').css("display", "block");
	    jQuery('body').css("overflow", "hidden"); //keep background from scrolling

	    var newEventName = 'ON_ModalFiredOptly';
	    var newOmniEventname = widget.popUp_Fired +'_PopUpFired';

	    //MA tag to wait for trigger
	    jQuery(document).on('wcd_tealiumTagFire:ready', function() {
	      wcdLib.trackValue(this,newOmniEventname,newOmniEventname,'eVar6');
	    });

	    window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
			window.optimizely.push({
	      type: "event",
	      eventName: newEventName
			});
	  }

	  function hidePopup() {
	    jQuery('.optly-modal').css("display", "none");
	    jQuery('.universal-modal--backdrop').css("display", "none");
	    jQuery('body').css("overflow", "auto"); //allow background scroll
    //gidLib.setCookie(cookieName,'true',emailpopExpireTime ,'/',cookieDomain);
		wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar( cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime );
	  }

	var ExitIntentEmailFormValidation = {
		action: actionlnk,
		email: '',
		emailConfirm: '',
		emailReg: /\b(^(\S+@).+((\.com)|(\.net)|(\.edu)|(\.mil)|(\.gov)|(\.org)|(\.aero)|(\.arpa)|(\.asia)|(\.biz)|(\.cat)|(\.coop)|(\.info)|(\.int)|(\.jobs)|(\.mobi)|(\.name)|(\.post)|(\.pro)|(\.tel)|(\.xxx)|(\..{2,2}))$)\b/gi,
		emailValidationFields: false,
		form: '',
		formName: '',
		formId: '#',
		formClass: '.',
		formType: '',
		returnEmail: false,
		returnForm: false,
		warningClass: 'validationWarning',
		warningConfirmEmailField: '',
		warningEmailField: '',
		warningEmailMatch: 'Email addresses must match',
		warningEmailValidationFields: 'WARNING: Email warning fields not found.',
		warningFieldClassSuffix: '_error',
		warningFormIdentifier: 'WARNING: invalid email form identifier.',
		warningFormLength: 'WARNING: form does not exist.',
		warningFormType: 'WARNING: invalid form type.',
		warningInvalidEmail: 'Invalid email address',
		warningMissingFields: 'WARNING: this form is missing required fields.',
		warningRequiredField: 'This field is required',
		init: function(name, identifier, type, validationFields) {
			/*
			* name is id or class name of form
			* identifier is either 'id' or 'class'
			* type is either 'basic', 'full' or 'rewards'
			* validationFields is either true of false
			*/
			this.formType = type;
			this.emailValidationFields = validationFields;
			if (identifier === 'id') {
				this.formName = this.formId + name;
				this.setForm();
			} else if (identifier === 'class') {
				this.formName = this.formClass + name;
				this.setForm();
			} else {
				console.info(this.warningFormIdentifier);
			}
		},
		basicValidation: function() {

			if (this.returnEmail === true) {
				// validation is complete
				// send the form
				this.sendBasicForm();
			}
		},
		sendBasicForm: function() {
			// resubmit form
			var action = this.action;
			this.form.off('submit');
			this.form.on('submit', function(event) {
				jQuery(this).attr('action', action);
	      event.preventDefault();
	      //cross domain post hack
	      //create new form paramaters in iframe
	      var brandCountryCode = document.getElementsByName("brand_country_code")[0].value;
	      var langPref = document.getElementsByName("lang_pref")[0].value;
	      var targetUrl = document.getElementsByName("targetURL")[0].value;
	      //var srcSpc = document.getElementsByName("src_spfc_cd")[0].value;
	      var srcSpc = jQuery('#exit_Intent_Modal_Custom').find('[name="src_spfc_cd"]')[0].value;

	      var theEmail = document.getElementById("email-ftr").value;
	      formParams = [
				  {"name": "brand_country_code", "value": brandCountryCode, "type": "hidden"},
				  {"name": "lang_pref", "value": langPref, "type": "hidden"},
				  {"name": "src_gnrc_cd", "value": "WEBSITE EMAIL SIGNUP", "type": "hidden"},
				  {"name": "src_spfc_cd", "value": srcSpc, "type": "hidden"},
				  {"name": "email", "value": theEmail, "type": "email"},
	        // {"name": "targetURL","value":targetURL, "type":"hidden"}
				];
	      ExitIntentEmailFormValidation.makeCrossDomainPost(formParams, ExitIntentEmailFormValidation.createThankYouPage);

	    });
			this.form.submit();
		},
		makeCrossDomainPost: function(formParms, callback) {
	    console.info('%c   crossDomainPost','color:#bada55;background:url(http://www.neilsalazar.com/images/nslogov24d.png) no-repeat;background-size:13%;background-position:left top');

			var theAction = document.getElementById("exit_Intent_Modal_Custom").action;
			var iframe = document.createElement("iframe");
			var uniqueString = "ETLI3mrCzAq83v8uceg6XUT0wfcGa5Fo";

			document.body.appendChild(iframe);
			iframe.style.display = "none";
			iframe.contentWindow.name = uniqueString;

			var form = document.createElement("form");
			form.target = uniqueString;
			form.action = theAction;
			form.method = "POST";
			form.className = "email_acqui_modal";
	    // form.onsubmit = "return makeAjaxCall()";

			for(x=0;x<formParams.length;x++) {
				var input = document.createElement("input");
				input.type = formParams[x].type;
				input.name = formParams[x].name;
				input.value = formParams[x].value;
				form.appendChild(input);
			}

			document.body.appendChild(form);
	    // function makeAjaxCall() {
	    //   console.info('%c   ajaxCall','color:#bada55;background:url(http://www.neilsalazar.com/images/nslogov24d.png) no-repeat;background-size:13%;background-position:left top');
	    //   jQuery.ajax({
	  	// 			type: jQuery(this).prop('method'),
	  	// 			url : jQuery(this).prop('action'),
	  	// 			data: jQuery(this).serialize()
	  	// 		}).done(function() {
	    //       console.info('%c   ajaxComplete','color:#bada55;background:url(http://www.neilsalazar.com/images/nslogov24d.png) no-repeat;background-size:13%;background-position:left top');
	    //       callback();
	    //     });
	    //   return false;
	    // }
	    form.submit();
	    jQuery('.emailAcquiForm').hide();
	    jQuery('.thinkingWrap').show();
			// form.submit(function(e) {
	    //   console.info('%c   formOnSubmit','color:#bada55;background:url(http://www.neilsalazar.com/images/nslogov24d.png) no-repeat;background-size:13%;background-position:left top');
	    //   jQuery('.thinkingWrap').show();
			// 	e.preventDefault();
			// 	jQuery.ajax({
			// 		type: jQuery(this).prop('method'),
			// 		url : jQuery(this).prop('action'),
			// 		data: jQuery(this).serialize()
			// 	}).done(function() {
	    //     console.info('%c   ajaxComplete','color:#bada55;background:url(http://www.neilsalazar.com/images/nslogov24d.png) no-repeat;background-size:13%;background-position:left top');
	    //
			// 		callback();
			// 	});
			// })
			callback();
		},
		createThankYouPage: function() {
	    var newEventNameSubmit = 'ON_PopUpModalSubmit_Optly';
	    var newOmniEventnameSubmit = widget.popUp_Fired_Submit +'_PopUpSubmit';
	    setTimeout(function(){
	    	//trackValue(this,newOmniEventnameSubmit,newOmniEventnameSubmit,'eVar7');
	      wcdLib.trackValue(this,newOmniEventnameSubmit,newOmniEventnameSubmit,'eVar7');
	    },1500);


	    window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
			window.optimizely.push({
	      type: "event",
	      eventName: newEventNameSubmit
			});
			//jQuery('.optly-modal-content').html('<h2>THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! AAAHHHHHHH!!!! THANKS!!!!!!!!!</h2>');
			// jQuery('.emailAcquiForm').hide();
	    // jQuery('.thinkingWrap').show();

			 //var brandPreference = jQuery('.thankYouWrapper').data('brand-custom-pref');
			setTimeout(function() {
	      jQuery('.thinkingWrap').hide();
	      jQuery('.thankYouWrapper').show();
	    },1000);
			// jQuery('.'+brandPreference+ ' .prefSection').load("/Asset_Archive/ATWeb/content/0012/158/666/cn12158666.html")
			// if(brandPreference == "defaultThankYou"){
			// 	ExitIntentEmailFormValidation.sendToPrefPage();
			// }
		},
		sendToPrefPage: function() {
			jQuery('.updatePrefsLink').click(function(e) {
				e.preventDefault();
				var input = document.createElement("input");
				input.type = "hidden";
				input.name = "targetURL";
				// input.value = document.getElementsByName("targetURL")[0].value;
				input.value = jQuery('#exit_Intent_Modal_Custom').find('[name="targetURL"]').attr('value');
				var prefForm = document.getElementsByClassName('email_acqui_modal')[0];
				prefForm.appendChild(input);
				prefForm.setAttribute('target','_blank');
				prefForm.submit();
				jQuery('.optly-modal-close').click();
			});
		},
		setForm: function() {
			this.form = (jQuery(this.formName));
			if (this.form.length === 1) {
				// get email fields
				//this.email = jQuery(this.formName + ' input[name="email"]');
	      this.email = jQuery(this.formName).find('input[name="email"]');
				this.emailConfirm = this.email;
				// check if email warning is inline or on external fields
				if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
					this.warningEmailField = jQuery(this.formName + ' .email' + this.warningFieldClassSuffix);
					//this.warningConfirmEmailField = jQuery(this.formName + ' .confirm_email' + this.warningFieldClassSuffix);
					// verify email warning fields exist on page
					/*if (this.warningConfirmEmailField.length === 0 || this.warningConfirmEmailField.length === 0) {
						console.info(this.warningEmailValidationFields);
					}*/
				}
				if (this.email.length === 1) {
					this.validateEmail();
				} else {
					console.info(this.warningMissingFields);
				}
			} else {
				console.info(this.warningFormLength);
			}
		},
		validateEmail: function() {
			var email = this.email.val();
			var emailDefault = this.email.attr('placeholder');
			var confirm = email;

			// check if empty or default
			if (email.length > 0 && email !== emailDefault && email !== this.warningRequiredField) {
				// check if valid email
				// clearing regExp index
				this.emailReg.lastIndex = 0;
				if (this.emailReg.test(email) === true) {
					// remove warnings from email
					if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
						this.warningEmailField.val('');
					}
					this.email.removeClass(this.warningClass);

					// check if confirm email matches
					if (email === confirm) {
						// remove warnings from confirm email
						if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
							this.warningConfirmEmailField.val('');
						}
						this.returnEmail = true;

						// check if validation is basic or full
						if (this.formType === 'basic') {
							this.basicValidation();
						} else {
							console.info(this.warningFormType);
						}

					} else {
						// add warning to confirm email
						/*if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
							this.warningConfirmEmailField.val(this.warningEmailMatch);
						} */
						//this.emailConfirm.addClass(this.warningClass);

						// return false
						this.returnEmail = false;

					}
				} else {
					// add invalid email warning to email
					if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
						this.warningEmailField.val(this.warningInvalidEmail);
					} else {
						this.email.val(this.warningInvalidEmail);
					}

					this.email.addClass(this.warningClass);
				}
			} else {
				if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
					this.warningEmailField.html(this.warningRequiredField);
				} else {
					this.email.val(this.warningRequiredField);
					//this.emailConfirm.val(this.warningRequiredField);
				}

				this.email.addClass(this.warningClass);
				//this.emailConfirm.addClass(this.warningClass);
			}
		}
	};
	var setFooterEmailInputDefault = function(elem) {
		var input = elem;
		if (input.val() == '' && input.attr('placeholder') !== '') {
			input.val(input.attr('placeholder'));
		}
	};
	var clearFooterEmailInputDefault = function(elem) {
		var input = jQuery(elem);
		var emailValidation = ['This field is required', 'Email addresses must match'];
		if (input.val() === input.attr('placeholder') || input.val().indexOf(emailValidation) > -1) {
			input.val('');
		}
	};
	var setFooterEmailBlurFocus = function(wcdForm) {
		var email = jQuery(wcdForm + ' input[name="email"]');
		// set blur
		email.on('blur', function() {
			var elem = jQuery(this);
			setFooterEmailInputDefault(elem);
		});

		// // set focus
		// email.on('focus', function() {
		// 	var elem = jQuery(this);
		// 	clearFooterEmailInputDefault(elem);
		// 	console.info('%c focused', 'color:blue');
		// 	elem.removeClass('validationWarning');
		// });

	  //clear 'nitpicky' validation
	  email.on('focus keydown click', function() {
	    var elem = jQuery(this);
	    if(elem.hasClass('validationWarning')) {
	      clearFooterEmailInputDefault(elem);
	      console.info('%c kp & click', 'color:blue');
	      elem.removeClass('validationWarning');
	    }
	  });

	};

	//set validation on email form submit
		jQuery("#exit_Intent_Modal_Custom").on('submit keydown', function(e){
	    //console.info('modalButton submitted');
	    if (e.keyCode === 13) {
	      e.preventDefault();
	      ExitIntentEmailFormValidation.init('exit_Intent_Modal_Custom','id','basic',false);
	    }
	  });
		jQuery("#exit_ModalButton").on('click', function(e){
	    //console.info('modalButton submitted');
	      e.preventDefault();
	      ExitIntentEmailFormValidation.init('exit_Intent_Modal_Custom','id','basic',false);
	  });
	  setFooterEmailBlurFocus('#exit_Intent_Modal_Custom');

	}

}); // end of document ready

PluginManager.registerAnalyticsTracker('9014392212', {
      preRedirectPolicy: 'PERSIST_BEFORE_REDIRECT',
      postRedirectPolicy: 'TRACK_IMMEDIATELY',
      nonRedirectPolicy: 'TRACK_IMMEDIATELY',
      onLayerDecision: [
        'stores/layer_data',
        function onLayerDecisionGetter(LayerDataStore) {
          return function(decisionData) {
            var campaignId = decisionData.decision.layerId;
            var layer = LayerDataStore.get(campaignId);
            var extension = layer.integrationSettings && layer.integrationSettings['9014392212'];
            if (!extension) {
              return;
            }
            var campaign = {
              id: campaignId,
              name: layer.name,
              policy: layer.policy,
              integrationStringVersion: layer.integrationStringVersion,
            };
            var experimentId = decisionData.decision.experimentId;
            var variationId = decisionData.decision.variationId;
            var isHoldback = decisionData.decision.isLayerHoldback;
            extension.$fieldDefaults = [];
            (function(widg) {
  var i = 0;
  var field;
  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {
    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];
    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(extension);
            var decisionString = window.optimizely.get('state').getDecisionString({campaignId: campaignId});

// Public Methods
var adobeIntegrator = {
	// Array of objects for active campaigns/experiments
	campaignArray: [],
	// Accepts "s" variable as a param and assigns campaigns/experiments to list.
	assignCampaigns: function(sVariable) {
    sVariable.list1 = sVariable.list1 || [];
		for (var i = this.campaignArray.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
      var campaignString = sanitizeString(this.campaignArray[i]);
      sVariable.list1.push(campaignString);
			this.campaignArray.splice(i, 1);
		}
	},
	// Accepts "s" variable as a param and assigns eVars to object, then dispatches custom link tracking.
	trackDelayedCampaigns: function(sVariable) {
    sVariable.list1 = sVariable.list1 || [];
    sVariable.linkTrackVars += ",list1";
		for (var i = this.campaignArray.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
      var campaignString = sanitizeString(this.campaignArray[i]);
			sVariable.list1.push(campaignString);
			this.campaignArray.splice(i, 1);
		}
    sVariable.tl(true, "o", "OptimizelyLayerDecision");
	}
};

// Removes special characters and spaces from decisionString.
function sanitizeString(string) {
	var result = string.replace(/[^A-Z0-9:()]/ig, "_");
  return result;
}

// Scopes `campaignArray` to Optimizely object.
if (window.optimizely.get("custom/adobeIntegrator") === undefined) {
	window.optimizely.push({
		type: "registerModule",
		moduleName: "adobeIntegrator",
		module: adobeIntegrator
	});
}

// Failing Audiences returns `null`, failing Traffic Allocation returns `undefined` for decisionString.
if (!!decisionString) {
	window.optimizely.get("custom/adobeIntegrator").campaignArray.push(decisionString);
}

          }
        }
      ],
      trackLayerDecision: function(decisionData) {
        var extension = decisionData.integrationSettings && decisionData.integrationSettings['9014392212'];
        if (!extension) {
          return;
        }
        var campaign = {
          id: decisionData.layerId,
          name: decisionData.layerName,
          policy: decisionData.layerPolicy,
          integrationStringVersion: decisionData.integrationStringVersion,
        };
        var campaignId = campaign.id;
        var experimentId = decisionData.experimentId;
        var variationId = decisionData.variationId;
        var isHoldback = decisionData.isLayerHoldback;
        extension.$fieldDefaults = [];
        (function(widg) {
  var i = 0;
  var field;
  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {
    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];
    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(extension);
        var decisionString = window.optimizely.get('state').getDecisionString({campaignId: campaignId});

// Public Methods
var adobeIntegrator = {
	// Array of objects for active campaigns/experiments
	campaignArray: [],
	// Accepts "s" variable as a param and assigns campaigns/experiments to list.
	assignCampaigns: function(sVariable) {
    sVariable.list1 = sVariable.list1 || [];
		for (var i = this.campaignArray.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
      var campaignString = sanitizeString(this.campaignArray[i]);
      sVariable.list1.push(campaignString);
			this.campaignArray.splice(i, 1);
		}
	},
	// Accepts "s" variable as a param and assigns eVars to object, then dispatches custom link tracking.
	trackDelayedCampaigns: function(sVariable) {
    sVariable.list1 = sVariable.list1 || [];
    sVariable.linkTrackVars += ",list1";
		for (var i = this.campaignArray.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
      var campaignString = sanitizeString(this.campaignArray[i]);
			sVariable.list1.push(campaignString);
			this.campaignArray.splice(i, 1);
		}
    sVariable.tl(true, "o", "OptimizelyLayerDecision");
	}
};

// Removes special characters and spaces from decisionString.
function sanitizeString(string) {
	var result = string.replace(/[^A-Z0-9:()]/ig, "_");
  return result;
}

// Scopes `campaignArray` to Optimizely object.
if (window.optimizely.get("custom/adobeIntegrator") === undefined) {
	window.optimizely.push({
		type: "registerModule",
		moduleName: "adobeIntegrator",
		module: adobeIntegrator
	});
}

// Failing Audiences returns `null`, failing Traffic Allocation returns `undefined` for decisionString.
if (!!decisionString) {
	window.optimizely.get("custom/adobeIntegrator").campaignArray.push(decisionString);
}

      },
      serializeSettings: JSON.stringify,
      deserializeSettings: JSON.parse,
    });

  })(extension);

// Public Methods
var adobeIntegrator = {
	// Array of objects for active campaigns/experiments
	campaignArray: [],
	// Accepts "s" variable as a param and assigns campaigns/experiments to list.
	assignCampaigns: function(sVariable) {
    sVariable.list1 = sVariable.list1 || [];
		for (var i = this.campaignArray.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
      var campaignString = sanitizeString(this.campaignArray[i]);
      sVariable.list1.push(campaignString);
			this.campaignArray.splice(i, 1);
		}
	},
	// Accepts "s" variable as a param and assigns eVars to object, then dispatches custom link tracking.
	trackDelayedCampaigns: function(sVariable) {
    sVariable.list1 = sVariable.list1 || [];
    sVariable.linkTrackVars += ",list1";
		for (var i = this.campaignArray.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
      var campaignString = sanitizeString(this.campaignArray[i]);
			sVariable.list1.push(campaignString);
			this.campaignArray.splice(i, 1);
		}
    sVariable.tl(true, "o", "OptimizelyLayerDecision");
	}
};

// Removes special characters and spaces from decisionString.
function sanitizeString(string) {
	var result = string.replace(/[^A-Z0-9:()]/ig, "_");
  return result;
}

// Scopes `campaignArray` to Optimizely object.
if (window.optimizely.get("custom/adobeIntegrator") === undefined) {
	window.optimizely.push({
		type: "registerModule",
		moduleName: "adobeIntegrator",
		module: adobeIntegrator
	});
}

// Failing Audiences returns `null`, failing Traffic Allocation returns `undefined` for decisionString.
if (!!decisionString) {
	window.optimizely.get("custom/adobeIntegrator").campaignArray.push(decisionString);
}

          }
        }
      ],
      trackLayerDecision: function(decisionData) {
        var extension = decisionData.integrationSettings && decisionData.integrationSettings['9015842915'];
        if (!extension) {
          return;
        }
        var campaign = {
          id: decisionData.layerId,
          name: decisionData.layerName,
          policy: decisionData.layerPolicy,
          integrationStringVersion: decisionData.integrationStringVersion,
        };
        var campaignId = campaign.id;
        var experimentId = decisionData.experimentId;
        var variationId = decisionData.variationId;
        var isHoldback = decisionData.isLayerHoldback;
        extension.$fieldDefaults = [];
        (function(widg) {
  var i = 0;
  var field;
  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {
    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];
    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(extension);
        
var decisionString = window.optimizely.get('state').getDecisionString({campaignId: campaignId});

// Public Methods
var adobeIntegrator = {
	// Array of objects for active campaigns/experiments
	campaignArray: [],
	// Accepts "s" variable as a param and assigns campaigns/experiments to list.
	assignCampaigns: function(sVariable) {
    sVariable.list1 = sVariable.list1 || [];
		for (var i = this.campaignArray.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
      var campaignString = sanitizeString(this.campaignArray[i]);
      sVariable.list1.push(campaignString);
			this.campaignArray.splice(i, 1);
		}
	},
	// Accepts "s" variable as a param and assigns eVars to object, then dispatches custom link tracking.
	trackDelayedCampaigns: function(sVariable) {
    sVariable.list1 = sVariable.list1 || [];
    sVariable.linkTrackVars += ",list1";
		for (var i = this.campaignArray.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {
      var campaignString = sanitizeString(this.campaignArray[i]);
			sVariable.list1.push(campaignString);
			this.campaignArray.splice(i, 1);
		}
    sVariable.tl(true, "o", "OptimizelyLayerDecision");
	}
};

// Removes special characters and spaces from decisionString.
function sanitizeString(string) {
	var result = string.replace(/[^A-Z0-9:()]/ig, "_");
  return result;
}

// Scopes `campaignArray` to Optimizely object.
if (window.optimizely.get("custom/adobeIntegrator") === undefined) {
	window.optimizely.push({
		type: "registerModule",
		moduleName: "adobeIntegrator",
		module: adobeIntegrator
	});
}

// Failing Audiences returns `null`, failing Traffic Allocation returns `undefined` for decisionString.
if (!!decisionString) {
	window.optimizely.get("custom/adobeIntegrator").campaignArray.push(decisionString);
}

      },
      serializeSettings: JSON.stringify,
      deserializeSettings: JSON.parse,
    });

  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {

    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(widget);
        var extension = widget;
        widget._styleTag = document.getElementById('widget-css-9264281006');
if (widget._styleTag) widget._styleTag.parentNode.removeChild(widget._styleTag);
        jQuery('.details-optly-modal').remove();

      },
    });

        /**************************
	Name: E-Greeter
  Dev: Nitya Agrawal
  UX: Devon Taylor
  Functionality: 
  	* Email Address Capture
    * Due Date Capture
    * Close button Interaction
