globalEgreeter = '';
var utils = window.optimizely.get('utils');
var cookieDomain = (location.hostname.indexOf('gidapps')>-1) ? '.gidapps.com' : '.gap.com';
var egreeterExpireTime = '';
var cookieName = 'egreet';
var divPrefTealiumHP ='false';

//Only for Category pages
//utils.waitForElement('.l--cat-page-photos').then(function(){
utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(){
  utils.waitUntil(function(){
     return jQuery(extension.unitPlacement).length > 0;
  }).then(function(){
      //unitPlace = '.l--cat-page-photos';
      mainBlkfunction(); 
     globalEgreeter = 'A';
     jQuery(document).trigger('egreeter:ready');
     //console.log('egreeter fired !! second jquery script');
  });
});



//utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
window.mainBlkfunction = function(){
  var eGreetVal = '';
  egreeterExpireTime = gidLib.getFutureDate({'days':'1'});
  eGreetVal = gidLib.getCookie('egreet');
 
  //Adding tealium check for HP
  if(location.pathname == '/'){
  	if(localStorage.getItem("tealium_va")!==null){
      var gapDivPrefString = 27867;
      var tealium_va = localStorage.getItem("tealium_va");
    	tealium_va = JSON.parse(tealium_va);
    	if(typeof(tealium_va.properties[gapDivPrefString])!=='undefined' && typeof(tealium_va.properties[gapDivPrefString])!== undefined){
        var divPrefValue = tealium_va.properties[gapDivPrefString];
        if (divPrefValue.indexOf("MATERNITY")  === 0){
          divPrefTealiumHP = 'true';           
        }else{
          divPrefTealiumHP = 'false';   
        }
      }
      else{
        divPrefTealiumHP = 'false'; 
      }
		}
  }  
  
  
  
  if(eGreetVal !== 'true' || (location.pathname == '/browse/division.do' && gidLib.getCookie('dp_egreet') !=='true')){
    
   // commented on 3/4/18
    //gidLib.setCookie('GOL_has_seen_modal','true',egreeterExpireTime ,'/',cookieDomain);
    
  	if( jQuery('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {
      
      //if(location.pathname == '/browse/division.do' || location.pathname == '/'){
      if(location.pathname == '/' && divPrefTealiumHP == 'true'){
        jQuery(extension.unitPlacement).append(extension.$html);
      	setTimeout(function() {
        	jQuery("#datepicker").datepicker();
          gidLib.setCookie(cookieName,'true',egreeterExpireTime ,'/',cookieDomain); 
      	},1500);
      }else if(location.pathname == '/browse/division.do' ){
      	jQuery(extension.unitPlacement).append(extension.$html);
        setTimeout(function() {
        	jQuery("#datepicker").datepicker();
          gidLib.setCookie(cookieName,'true',egreeterExpireTime ,'/',cookieDomain); 
      	},1500);
      }else if( location.pathname == '/browse/category.do'){
      	jQuery(extension.unitPlacement).prepend(extension.$html);
      	setTimeout(function() {
        	jQuery("#datepicker").datepicker();
          gidLib.setCookie(cookieName,'true',egreeterExpireTime ,'/',cookieDomain); 
      	},1500);
      }
     
      
      	jQuery(".prsn_mat_egreeter_wrap").show();
       
      jQuery('.errorClass').html('');
    }
    

    /*Omniture tracking*/
      var newEventNameM = 'Mat_EgreeterFiredOptly';
      var newOmniEventnameM = 'Mat_EgreeterFired';
      //MA tag to wait for trigger
     
      setTimeout(function() {
        trackValue(this,newOmniEventnameM,newOmniEventnameM,'eVar6');
       },2000);
    
      window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
      window.optimizely.push({
        type: "event",
        eventName: newEventNameM
      });
    
    /* Close Button */
    jQuery('.e-greeter-close').on('click',function(e){
      e.preventDefault();
      gidLib.setCookie(cookieName,'true',egreeterExpireTime ,'/',cookieDomain);
      if(location.pathname == '/browse/division.do'){
      	gidLib.setCookie('dp_egreet','true',egreeterExpireTime ,'/',cookieDomain);
      }
      jQuery(".prsn_mat_egreeter_wrap").hide();
    }); 
    
    /* date enter */
    jQuery('.duedateWrap').on('click',function(){
    	jQuery('.errorClass').html('');
       utag.link({"maternity_due_date": jQuery("#datepicker").val(),"event_name": 'Select Due Date'});
    });
    
   /* Due Date Capture */
    window.dueDateCapture = function(){
      
        if(jQuery('#datepicker').val() !== '' && jQuery('#egreeter_Custom').find('input[name="email"]').val() !== ''){
         
          var todayDateF = new Date();
          var todayDate = Date.parse(new Date(todayDateF));
          
          var endDateF = new Date(jQuery('#datepicker').val());
          var endDate = Date.parse(new Date(endDateF));
          
          var startDate = endDateF.setDate(endDateF.getDate() - 270);
         
          var firstTri = new Date(startDate);
          firstTri.setDate(firstTri.getDate() + 91);
          
          var secondTri = new Date(startDate);
          secondTri.setDate(secondTri.getDate() + 182);
          
          var thirdTri = new Date(startDate);
          thirdTri.setDate(thirdTri.getDate() + 280);
          
          var fourthTri = new Date(startDate);
          fourthTri.setDate(fourthTri.getDate() + 364);
          
          if(todayDate > startDate && todayDate < firstTri){
          	//console.log('1st trimester');
            jQuery('.defaultThankYou').addClass('egreeterPos1'); 
          }
          else if(todayDate > firstTri  && todayDate < secondTri ){
            //console.log('2st trimester');
            jQuery('.defaultThankYou').addClass('egreeterPos2');
          }
          else if(todayDate > secondTri && todayDate < thirdTri){
            //console.log('3st trimester');
            jQuery('.defaultThankYou').addClass('egreeterPos3');
          }
          else{
            //console.log('4st trimester');
            jQuery('.defaultThankYou').addClass('egreeterPos4');
          }
          jQuery('.prsn_mat_egreeter').hide();
          jQuery('.thankYouWrapper').show();
          utag.link({"maternity_due_date": jQuery("#datepicker").val(),"event_name": 'Set Due Date'});
          gidLib.setCookie(cookieName,'true',egreeterExpireTime ,'/',cookieDomain);
          
          /*Omniture tracking*/
          var newEventNameP = 'Mat_EgreeterSubOptly';
          var newOmniEventnameP = 'Mat_EgreeterSubmit';
          //MA tag to wait for trigger
          
          var temp = setTimeout(function() {
            trackValue(this,newOmniEventnameP,newOmniEventnameP,'eVar6');
          },500);
          
          window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
          window.optimizely.push({
            type: "event",
            eventName: newEventNameP
          });
        }
    	//},1000);
    };
  
   /* Email Address Capture */
    window.EgreeterValidation = {
      action: 'https://secure-www.gap.com/profile/updateEmailPreferences.do',
      email: '',
      emailConfirm: '',
      emailReg: /\b(^(\S+@).+((\.com)|(\.net)|(\.edu)|(\.mil)|(\.gov)|(\.org)|(\.aero)|(\.arpa)|(\.asia)|(\.biz)|(\.cat)|(\.coop)|(\.info)|(\.int)|(\.jobs)|(\.mobi)|(\.name)|(\.post)|(\.pro)|(\.tel)|(\.xxx)|(\..{2,2}))$)\b/gi,
      emailValidationFields: false,
      form: '',
      formName: '',
      formId: '#',
      formClass: '.',
      formType: '',
      returnEmail: false,
      returnForm: false,
      warningClass: 'validationWarning',
      warningConfirmEmailField: '',
      warningEmailField: '',
      warningEmailMatch: 'Email addresses must match',
      warningEmailValidationFields: 'WARNING: Email warning fields not found.',
      warningFieldClassSuffix: '_error',
      warningFormIdentifier: 'WARNING: invalid email form identifier.',
      warningFormLength: 'WARNING: form does not exist.',
      warningFormType: 'WARNING: invalid form type.',
      warningInvalidEmail: 'Invalid email address',
      warningMissingFields: 'WARNING: this form is missing required fields.',
      warningRequiredField: 'This field is required',
      duedate:'',
      init: function(name, identifier, type, validationFields) {
        /*
        * name is id or class name of form
        * identifier is either 'id' or 'class'
        * type is either 'basic', 'full' or 'rewards'
        * validationFields is either true of false
        */
        this.formType = type;
        this.emailValidationFields = validationFields;
        if (identifier === 'id') {
          this.formName = this.formId + name;
          this.setForm();
        } else if (identifier === 'class') {
          this.formName = this.formClass + name;
          this.setForm();
        } else {
         // console.info(this.warningFormIdentifier);
        }
      },
      basicValidation: function() {
        var yearlength = 0;
        duedate = jQuery('#datepicker').val();
        if(duedate !== ''){
        	var checkformat = duedate.substr(6,4);
          yearlength = checkformat.length;
        }
        
        if(duedate !== '' && this.returnEmail === true && yearlength === 4 ){
       // if (this.returnEmail === true) {
          // validation is complete
          // send the form
          this.sendBasicForm();
        }else{
          jQuery('.errorClass').html('Please enter your due date in dd/mm/yyyy format');
        }
      },
      sendBasicForm: function() {
        // resubmit form
        var action = this.action;
        this.form.off('submit');
        this.form.on('submit', function(event) {
          jQuery(this).attr('action', action);
          event.preventDefault();
          //cross domain post hack
          //create new form paramaters in iframe
          var brandCountryCode = 'GPUS';
          var langPref = 'US_EN';
          var targetUrl = '/profile/info.do?cid=53959&amp;mlink=5058,8095009,Egreeter&amp;clink=8095009';
          //var targetUrl = 'http://www.gap.com/assets/common/clear.gif';
          var srcSpc = 'GP=Egreeter;BR=NA;ON=NA;PL=NA;AT=NA;BRFS=NA;GPO=NA';
	
          var theEmail = document.getElementById("email-ftrN").value;
          //console.log('recording email :'+ document.getElementById("email-ftrN").value);
          formParams = [
            {"name": "brand_country_code", "value": brandCountryCode, "type": "hidden"},
            {"name": "lang_pref", "value": langPref, "type": "hidden"},
            {"name": "src_gnrc_cd", "value": "WEBSITE EMAIL SIGNUP", "type": "hidden"},
            {"name": "src_spfc_cd", "value": srcSpc, "type": "hidden"},
            {"name": "email", "value": theEmail, "type": "email"},
          ];
          EgreeterValidation.makeCrossDomainPost(formParams, EgreeterValidation.createThankYouPage);
        });
        this.form.submit();
      },
      makeCrossDomainPost: function(formParms, callback) {
      

        var theAction = document.getElementById("egreeter_Custom").action;
        var iframe = document.createElement("iframe");
        var uniqueString = "ETLI3mrCzAq83v8uceg6XUT0wfcGa5Fo";

        document.body.appendChild(iframe);
        //document.getElementsByClassName('mkt_reg-hp--optly3')[0].appendChild(iframe);
        iframe.style.display = "none";
        iframe.contentWindow.name = uniqueString;

        var form = document.createElement("form");
        form.target = uniqueString;
        form.action = theAction;
        form.method = "POST";
        form.className = "email_acqui_modal";
        // form.onsubmit = "return makeAjaxCall()";

        for(x=0;x<formParams.length;x++) {
          var input = document.createElement("input");
          input.type = formParams[x].type;
          input.name = formParams[x].name;
          input.value = formParams[x].value;
          form.appendChild(input);
        }

        document.body.appendChild(form);
        //document.getElementsByClassName('mkt_reg-hp--optly3')[0].appendChild(form);
        form.submit();
        jQuery('.prsn_mat_egreeter').hide();
        //jQuery('.mkt_content-wrapper').hide();
        callback();
      },
      createThankYouPage: function() {
      },
      sendToPrefPage: function() {
        jQuery('.updatePrefsLink').click(function(e) {
          e.preventDefault();
          var input = document.createElement("input");
          input.type = "hidden";
          input.name = "targetURL";
          // input.value = document.getElementsByName("targetURL")[0].value;
          input.value = jQuery('#egreeter_Custom').find('[name="targetURL"]').attr('value');
          var prefForm = document.getElementsByClassName('email_acqui_modal')[0];
          prefForm.appendChild(input);
          prefForm.setAttribute('target','_blank');
          prefForm.submit();
          jQuery('.optly-modal-close').click();
        });
      },
      setForm: function() {
        this.form = (jQuery(this.formName));
        if (this.form.length === 1) {
          // get email fields

          this.email = jQuery(this.formName).find('input[name="email"]');
          this.emailConfirm = this.email;
          // check if email warning is inline or on external fields
          if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
            this.warningEmailField = jQuery(this.formName + ' .email' + this.warningFieldClassSuffix);

          }
          if (this.email.length === 1) {
            this.validateEmail();
          } else {
            console.info(this.warningMissingFields);
          }
        } else {
          console.info(this.warningFormLength);
        }
      },
      validateEmail: function() {
        var email = this.email.val();
        var emailDefault = this.email.attr('placeholder');
        var confirm = email;

        // check if empty or default
        if (email.length > 0 && email !== emailDefault && email !== this.warningRequiredField) {
          // check if valid email
          // clearing regExp index
          this.emailReg.lastIndex = 0;
          if (this.emailReg.test(email) === true) {
            // remove warnings from email
            if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
              this.warningEmailField.val('');
            }
            this.email.removeClass(this.warningClass);

            // check if confirm email matches
            if (email === confirm) {
              // remove warnings from confirm email
              if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
                this.warningConfirmEmailField.val('');
              }
              this.returnEmail = true;

              // check if validation is basic or full
              if (this.formType === 'basic') {
                this.basicValidation();
              } else {
                console.info(this.warningFormType);
              }

            } else {

              this.returnEmail = false;

            }
          } else {
            // add invalid email warning to email
            if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
              this.warningEmailField.val(this.warningInvalidEmail);
            } else {
              this.email.val(this.warningInvalidEmail);
            }

            this.email.addClass(this.warningClass);
          }
        } else {
          if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
            this.warningEmailField.html(this.warningRequiredField);
          } else {
            this.email.val(this.warningRequiredField);
            //this.emailConfirm.val(this.warningRequiredField);
          }

          this.email.addClass(this.warningClass);
          //this.emailConfirm.addClass(this.warningClass);
        }
      }
    };
		var setFooterEmailInputDefault = function(){};
    var setFooterEmailBlurFocus = function(wcdForm) {
      var email = jQuery(wcdForm + ' input[name="email"]');
      // set blur
      email.on('blur', function() {
        var elem = jQuery(this);
        setFooterEmailInputDefault(elem);
      });

      //clear 'nitpicky' validation
      email.on('focus keydown click', function() {
        jQuery('.errorClass').html('');
        var elem = jQuery(this);
        if(elem.hasClass('validationWarning')) {
          clearFooterEmailInputDefault(elem);
          //console.info('%c kp & click', 'color:blue');
          elem.removeClass('validationWarning');
        }
      });
    };

    //set validation on email form submit
      jQuery("#egreeter_Custom").on('submit', function(e){
       
        e.preventDefault();
        var b = 0;
        var a = jQuery('#datepicker').val();
        if(a !== ''){
        	var checkformat = a.substr(6,4);
          b = checkformat.length;
        }
        
        if(jQuery('#datepicker').val() !== '' && b === 4){
          jQuery('.errorClass').html('');
          dueDateCapture();
          EgreeterValidation.init('egreeter_Custom','id','basic',false);
        }
        else{
          jQuery('.errorClass').html('Please enter your due date in dd/mm/yyyy format');
        }	
      });
      setFooterEmailBlurFocus('#egreeter_Custom');

   } // Cookie condition
  
}; // end utils


      },
      hideFn: function(event) {
        var $ = window.optimizely.get('jquery');
        var widget = event.data.config;
        widget.$id = "9265900661";
        widget.$instance = event.data.id;
        widget.$fieldDefaults = [{"name":"unitPlacement","default_value":""},{"name":"imgSmall","default_value":"//cdn.optimizely.com/img/6529002483/4960ec66f00e4be0b48a62814b08f8b8.jpg"},{"name":"imgLarge","default_value":"//cdn.optimizely.com/img/6529002483/4960ec66f00e4be0b48a62814b08f8b8.jpg"},{"name":"maternityLogo","default_value":""},{"name":"headline","default_value":"We're Here For Every Stage"},{"name":"subheadline","default_value":"<span class=\"prsn-hide-in-lg\">Take the guesswork out.</span>Tell us about yourself and we'll tell you everything you need."}];
        (function(widg) {
  var i = 0;
  var field;
  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {
    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];
    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(widget);
        var extension = widget;
        widget._styleTag = document.getElementById('widget-css-9265900661');
if (widget._styleTag) widget._styleTag.parentNode.removeChild(widget._styleTag);
        var extensionHtml = document.getElementById('optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance);
if (extensionHtml) extensionHtml.remove();

      },
    });

        var utils = window.optimizely.get('utils');
var containerClassName = '';

function deleteContainer(containerClassName){
  utils.waitForElement(containerClassName).then(function(elem) {
    console.log('containerClassName:'+containerClassName);
   // if( jQuery(containerClassName).length > 0 ) {
    if( document.querySelectorAll(containerClassName).length > 0 ) {
      //jQuery(containerClassName).html('');
      document.querySelector(containerClassName).innerHTML = '';
    }
  });
}  
if(extension.regHP1 !== ''){
  containerClassName = extension.regHP1;
  deleteContainer(containerClassName);
}
if(extension.regHP2 !== ''){
  containerClassName = extension.regHP2;
  deleteContainer(containerClassName);
}

if(extension.regHP3 !== ''){
  containerClassName = extension.regHP3;
  deleteContainer(containerClassName);
}
if(extension.regHP4 !== ''){
  containerClassName = extension.regHP4;
  deleteContainer(containerClassName);
}
if(extension.regHP5 !== ''){
  containerClassName = extension.regHP5;
  deleteContainer(containerClassName);
}
if(extension.regHP6 !== ''){
  containerClassName = extension.regHP6;
  deleteContainer(containerClassName);
}
if(extension.regHP7 !== ''){
  containerClassName = extension.regHP7;
  deleteContainer(containerClassName);
}
if(extension.regHP8 !== ''){
  containerClassName = extension.regHP8;
  deleteContainer(containerClassName);
}

	 	certona_abvWrapper = jQuery("<div class='certona_abv-recs-wrapperN'></div>");

    certona_abvWrapper.find('.certona__recs-grid').append('<div class="certona_slick_Outerwrapper g-1-1"><div class="certona_slick_Innerwrapper"><div class="certona_slick_Block"><div class="certona_slick_wrapper"><div class="certona_slick"></div></div></div></div></div>');

    certona_abvWrapper.find('.certona__product-card').removeClass('g-2-5 g-lg-1-4 g-2-3 g-lg-3-4 g-xl-4-5 g-1280-1-5');
    certona_abvWrapper.find('.certona__product-card__image').addClass('certona_above_img_wrapper');
    jQuery('.CarouselBanner').find('.certona_blk_attach').append(certona_abvWrapper);
    jQuery(document).trigger('callSlickEBBResp');

        jQuery('.certona_slick').slick('resize');
    });

    jQuery(window).on('orientationchange', function () {
        jQuery('.certona_slick').slick('resize');
    });
}

//get local language

var runCount = 0;

var utils = window.optimizely.get('utils');
utils.waitForElement(placement).then(function(elem) {
  DPG_cdClockExt_v1.init(placement,localeLang,endTime,runCount);
});

var DPG_cdClockExt_v1 = {
  uniBarPlacement: 'false',
  init : function(placement, ll, endTime, runCount) {
    DPG_cdClockExt_v1.getLocaleLang(ll);
    DPG_cdClockExt_v1.initializeClock(endTime, runCount);
    DPG_cdClockExt_v1.appendHTML(placement);
  },

  getLocaleLang : function(ll) {
    if(ll.indexOf('fr_CA') > -1) {
     //show french hide English
      jQuery('.enV').hide();
      jQuery('.frV').css('display','inline-block');
      jQuery('.frV_inline').css('display','inline');
    } else {
     //locale didn't report... show english default
    }
  },

  getTimeRemaining : function(endTime, runCount) {
   var pasDate ='';
   try {
     if (window.personalizationService && personalizationService.model  && personalizationService.model.personalizationData  && personalizationService.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1 && personalizationService.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1.userContext) {
       pasDate = personalizationService.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1.userContext.viewDate;
     }
   } catch(e) {
     if (console && console.log) console.log(e);
   }
   var timestampPASCurrentDATE = Date.parse(new Date(pasDate)) + (runCount * 1000);
   var t = Date.parse(endTime) - timestampPASCurrentDATE;
   var seconds = Math.floor((t / 1000) % 60);
   var minutes = Math.floor((t / 1000 / 60) % 60);
   var hours = Math.floor((t / (1000 * 60 * 60)) % 24);
   var days = Math.floor(t / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
   return {
     'total': t,
     'days': days,
     'hours': hours,
     'minutes': minutes,
     'seconds': seconds
   };
  },

  initializeClock : function(endTime, runCount) {
      var t = DPG_cdClockExt_v1.getTimeRemaining(endTime,runCount);
      if(isNaN(t.hours) !== true){
        //change days to day if less than 2
        if(t.hours != '1'){
          jQuery('.cdc_pos1').html(t.hours);
        }else{
          jQuery('.cdc_pos1').html(t.hours);
          jQuery('.chkDay').html('day');
        }
        if(t.minutes != '1'){
          jQuery('.cdc_pos2').html(t.minutes);
        }else{
          jQuery('.cdc_pos2').html(t.minutes);
          jQuery('.chkHour').html('hour');
        }
        
        jQuery('.cdc_pos2').html(('0' + t.minutes).slice(-2));
      }

      if(t.hours == 0) {
      } else {
      }
      if (t.total <= 0) {
        clearInterval(timeinterval);
      }
    var timeinterval = setInterval(function() {
      runCount++;
      DPG_cdClockExt_v1.initializeClock(endTime, runCount);
    }, 1000);
  },

  appendHTML : function(placement) {
    if( jQuery('#ldto2_extension').length < 1 ) {
    

      if(placement == '.edfs-content') {
        
        jQuery(placement).prepend(extension.$html);
        jQuery('.wcd_edfs, .edfs-headline').hide();
        jQuery('.theDetails').addClass('uniBarDetails');
      } else {
        
        jQuery(placement).after(extension.$html);
        jQuery('.LDTO_phase2').addClass('afterNav');
        jQuery('.cdc_container').addClass('ddCardPlusUp');
        jQuery('.enV').addClass('cardPlusUpMsg');
      }
      var extensionHtml = jQuery('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance);
    	var empBlk = extensionHtml.find('.emptyClass');
      for(var i=0;i<empBlk.length ;i++){
        if(jQuery(empBlk[i]).html().trim() === ''){
            jQuery(empBlk[i]).addClass('hide');
        }
      }
    }
  }

};

      },
      hideFn: function(event) {
        var $ = window.optimizely.get('jquery');
        var widget = event.data.config;
        widget.$id = "10194644679";
        widget.$instance = event.data.id;
        widget.$fieldDefaults = [{"name":"unitPlacement","default_value":".edfs-content"},{"name":"beforeCopy","default_value":""},{"name":"text","default_value":""},{"name":"text_FR","default_value":""},{"name":"region","default_value":""},{"name":"endYear","default_value":"2018"},{"name":"endMonth","default_value":"01-12"},{"name":"endDate","default_value":"01-31"},{"name":"endTime","default_value":"hh:mm:ss"},{"name":"detailsLink","default_value":""}];
        (function(widg) {
  var i = 0;
  var field;
  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {
    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];
    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(widget);
        var extension = widget;
        widget._styleTag = document.getElementById('widget-css-10194644679');
if (widget._styleTag) widget._styleTag.parentNode.removeChild(widget._styleTag);
        jQuery('#ldto2_extension').remove();

      },
    });

        var utils = window.optimizely.get('utils');
if(location.pathname === '/buy/shopping_bag.do'){
  utils.waitForElement(extension.insertionPoint)
    .then(function(elem) {

        var utils = optimizely.get('utils');
var itsInBag;
var theHTML = extension.$html;
var optlySearchBar;
var onMobile = false;
if(window.innerWidth < 812) {onMobile = true;}

var htmlMarkUpContainer = document.createElement('div');
htmlMarkUpContainer.innerHTML = theHTML;

function scrollToShow(bagIt) {
  //insert extension.$html
  if(document.querySelector('#optly_search') === null){
    // console.info('%c scrolled to or past point','color:purple');
    document.body.appendChild(htmlMarkUpContainer);
    optlySearchBar = document.querySelector('#optly_search');

    setTimeout(function() {
    	optlySearchBar.classList.add('show_SoS');
      document.querySelector('.optlySearchBag .shopping-bag-trigger--value').textContent = bagIt;
    },100);
  } else {
   	optlySearchBar.style.display = 'block';
    setTimeout(function() {
    	optlySearchBar.classList.add('show_SoS');
    },100);
  }
}

function scrollToHide() {
    //remove extension.$html
  if(optlySearchBar !== null && typeof optlySearchBar !== 'undefined'){
    optlySearchBar.classList.remove('show_SoS');
    // console.info('%c scrolled back or beyond og point','color:purple');
    setTimeout(function(){
      document.querySelector('#optly_search').style.display = 'none';
      console.info('%c should be none','color:purple');
    }, 333);
  }
}

function scrollBarFunc() {
  var sOpenedSearch;
  if (window.pageYOffset > 250) {
    if(onMobile) {
      if(jQuery('#small-search').attr('aria-expanded') !== 'true') {
        jQuery('.search--toggle').click();
        sOpenedSearch = true;
      }
    } else {
      itsInBag = jQuery('.universal-nav--right .shopping-bag-trigger--value').html();
      scrollToShow(itsInBag);
    }
  } else if(window.pageYOffset < 200) {
    if(onMobile && sOpenedSearch) {
      jQuery('.search--toggle').click();
      sOpenedSearch = false;
    } else {
      scrollToHide();
    }
  }
}
utils.waitForElement('body')
  .then(function() {
    var hasScrolled = false;
    window.onscroll = runInterval;
    function runInterval() {
      hasScrolled = true;
    }
    setInterval(function() {
      if(hasScrolled){
        hasScrolled = false;
        console.info('scrolled');
        scrollBarFunc();
      }
    },100);
  });

      },
      hideFn: function(event) {
        var $ = window.optimizely.get('jquery');
        var widget = event.data.config;
        widget.$id = "10418551271";
        widget.$instance = event.data.id;
        widget.$fieldDefaults = [{"name":"text","default_value":"My Butterbar"}];
        (function(widg) {
  var i = 0;
  var field;
  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {
    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];
    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(widget);
        var extension = widget;
        widget._styleTag = document.getElementById('widget-css-10418551271');
if (widget._styleTag) widget._styleTag.parentNode.removeChild(widget._styleTag);
        var extensionHtml = document.getElementById('optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance);
if (extensionHtml) extensionHtml.remove();

      },
    });

function togglePromoBar( partial ) {
  var promoDrawer = document.querySelector(".pwa_promo_drawer");
  var promoHolder = document.querySelector(".pwa_promo_holder");
  var promoIsolation = document.querySelector(".pwa_isolation");

  var trackingId = "";  
  if( promoDrawer !== null && promoHolder !== null && promoIsolation !== null ) {
    if( promoDrawer.className.indexOf("pwa_promo_drawer_open") == -1 ) {
      promoDrawer.className += " pwa_promo_drawer_open";
      if( partial == true ) { promoDrawer.className += " pwa_promo_drawer_open_partial"; }
      promoHolder.className = "pwa_promo_holder sds_pd_top sds_pd_bottom";
      promoIsolation.className = "pwa_isolation";
      trackingId = "PWA Promo Drawer Opened";
    }
    else {
      promoDrawer.className = "pwa_promo_drawer sds_font--primary";
      //promoHolder.className += " hide";
      promoIsolation.className += " hide";
      trackingId = "PWA Promo Drawer Closed";
    }

    // Tracking call
    if( typeof window.utag !== "undefined" && typeof window.utag.link !== "undefined" ) {
      var trackingObj = {
        business_unit_id  : "3",
        link_name         : trackingId,
        content_item			: trackingId
      };
      window.utag.link(trackingObj);
    }
  }
};

function showPopup( container, value ) {
	hidePopup();
  
  // Reset frame and container
  var legalModal = document.querySelector('.optly-modal');
  var legalContainer = document.querySelector(".promoLegalContainer");
  var legalFrame = document.querySelector(".promoLegalFrame");

  if( legalModal !== null && legalContainer !== null && legalFrame !== null ) {    
    if( container ) {
      legalContainer.innerHTML = value;
      legalContainer.style.display = "block";
      console.log("legal container set");
    }
    else {
      legalFrame.setAttribute("src","/buy/promo_legal_details.do?promoId=" + value );
      legalFrame.style.display = "block";
      console.log("legal iframe set");
    }
  
    legalModal.style.display = "block";

    var trackingObj = {
      business_unit_id  : "3",
      link_name         : "pwaDrawer_promoDetailsModal_open",
      content_item			: "pwaDrawer_promoDetailsModal_open"
    };
    window.utag.link(trackingObj);
  }
};

function hidePopup() {
  var legalModal = document.querySelector('.optly-modal');
  var legalContainer = document.querySelector(".promoLegalContainer");
  var legalFrame = document.querySelector(".promoLegalFrame");
  
  if( legalModal !== null && legalContainer !== null && legalFrame !== null ) {
    // Hide modal
    legalModal.style.display = "none";
    // Reset frame and container
    legalContainer.innerHTML = "";
    legalContainer.style.display = "none";
    legalFrame.setAttribute("src","");
    legalFrame.style.display = "none";
  }
};

function doesLocalStorageExist() {
	var mod = 'testLS';
	try {
		localStorage.setItem(mod, mod);
		localStorage.removeItem(mod);
		return true;
	} catch(e) {
		return false;
	}
};

var utils = window.optimizely.get("utils");
utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
  if( document.querySelector("#optimizely-extension-" + extension.$instance ) === null && document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement) !== null ) {
    document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterend', extension.$html);
    
    console.log("promo drawer enabled");
    
    var titleBar = document.querySelector(".pwa_promo_title");
    if( titleBar !== null ) {
    	titleBar.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
		    event.preventDefault();
        togglePromoBar( false );
			});
    }
    var promoIsolation = document.querySelector(".pwa_isolation");
		if( promoIsolation !== null ) {
    	promoIsolation.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
		    event.preventDefault();
        togglePromoBar( false );
			});      
    }
      
    // Promo details links
    var promoDetails = document.querySelectorAll(".detailsLink");
    if( promoDetails.length > 0 ) {
      for( var i=0; i < promoDetails.length; i++ ) {
        promoDetails[i].addEventListener('click', function(event) {
          event.preventDefault();

          console.log( event );
          console.log( promoDetails );            
          console.log('click on promo details ' + i );

          var promoTarget = event.target;
          console.log( promoTarget );

          var promoId = promoTarget.getAttribute("data-ppcid");
          console.log('promo PPC ID: ' + promoId);

          var promoCustomLegal = promoTarget.getAttribute("data-customlegal");
          console.log('promo legal: ' + promoCustomLegal);

          if( promoCustomLegal !== null && promoCustomLegal != "" ) {
            showPopup( true, promoCustomLegal );
          }
          else if( promoId !== null && promoId != "" ) {
            showPopup( false, promoId );
          }
        });
      }
      document.querySelector(".optly-modal-close").addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        event.preventDefault();
        hidePopup();
      });
    }

    if( doesLocalStorageExist ) {
      if( localStorage.getItem("wcd_pwa_drawer") == null ){
        // Auto pop, wait a few and close
        togglePromoBar( true );
        localStorage.setItem("wcd_pwa_drawer","true");
        
        var closeTimeout = setTimeout(function() {
          var promoDrawer = document.querySelector(".pwa_promo_drawer");
          if( promoDrawer.className.indexOf("pwa_promo_drawer_open") > -1 ) {
            togglePromoBar( false );
          }
				}, 5000 );
      }
    }
  }
});

      },

    certona_abvWrapper.find('.certona__product-card').removeClass('g-2-5 g-lg-1-4 g-2-3 g-lg-3-4 g-xl-4-5 g-1280-1-5');

    jQuery('.CarouselBanner').find('.certona_blk_attach').append(certona_abvWrapper);
    jQuery(document).trigger('callSlickEBBResp');

        jQuery('.certona_slick').slick('resize');
    });

        jQuery('.certona_slick').slick('resize');
    });
}

    //elem.firstElementChild.firstElementChild.style.display = 'none';
    //elem.firstElementChild.firstElementChild.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'none';

  	var ext_HTML = document.createElement('div');
  	ext_HTML.innerHTML = extension.$html;
  	
  	//append to actual element
    elem.appendChild(ext_HTML);
  	
  	//map editable fields to a variable
  	//for multiple instances of extension AFTER it's appended or it doesn't exist yet
   	var thisExtensionId = 'optimizely-extension-'+extension.$instance;
  	var thisExtension = document.querySelector('#'+thisExtensionId);
  
		//svg overlay? or not?
  	var svgOverlayVal = extension.svgOverlay;
  	if(svgOverlayVal == 'false'){
     document.querySelector('#'+thisExtensionId+' .svgOverlay').style.display = 'none';
    }
  
  	//set full element to block, hiding because of current WW banner on site
  	elem.style.display = 'block';
  	//fine tune width to match brand footer
  	elem.style.maxWidth = extension.maxWidth;
  
  	//hide this extension [editable field] if multiple extensions in an experiement/page
    thisExtension.style.display = extension.shBanner;
  });

        widget.$id = "10566259908";

        //get editable fields and other variables
debug_dpgCDC = false;
if(location.href.indexOf('debugCDC') > -1) {debug_dpgCDC = true;}
var placement = extension.unitPlacement;
if(debug_dpgCDC) {console.info('the placement ' + placement);}
var endTime = extension.endYear+'-'+extension.endMonth+'-'+extension.endDate+'T'+extension.endTime+'-07:00';
if(debug_dpgCDC) {console.info(endTime);}
//get local language
var localeLang = gidLib.getCookie('locale');
var runCount = 0;

var utils = window.optimizely.get('utils');
utils.waitForElement(placement).then(function(elem) {
  if(debug_dpgCDC) {console.info('the placement 2 ' +placement);}
  DPG_cdClockExt_v1.init(placement,localeLang,endTime,runCount);
});

var DPG_cdClockExt_v1 = {
  uniBarPlacement: 'false',


  init : function(placement, ll, endTime, runCount) {
    if(debug_dpgCDC) {console.info(placement);}
    DPG_cdClockExt_v1.initializeClock(endTime, runCount);
    DPG_cdClockExt_v1.appendHTML(placement);
    DPG_cdClockExt_v1.getLocaleLang(ll);
  },

  getLocaleLang : function(ll) {
    if(ll.indexOf('fr_CA') > -1) {
     //show french hide English
     if(debug_dpgCDC) {console.info('%c francais','color:purple');}
      jQuery('.enV').hide();
      jQuery('.frV').css('display','inline-block');
      jQuery('.frV_inline').css('display','inline');
    } else {
      if(debug_dpgCDC) {console.info('%c english or not en or fr','color:purple');}
     //locale didn't report... show english default
    }
  },

  getTimeRemaining : function(endTime, runCount) {
   var pasDate ='';
   try {
     if (window.personalizationService && personalizationService.model  && personalizationService.model.personalizationData  && personalizationService.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1 && personalizationService.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1.userContext) {
       pasDate = personalizationService.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1.userContext.viewDate;
     }
   } catch(e) {
     if (console && console.log) console.log(e);
   }
   var timestampPASCurrentDATE = Date.parse(new Date(pasDate)) + (runCount * 1000);
   var t = Date.parse(endTime) - timestampPASCurrentDATE;
   var seconds = Math.floor((t / 1000) % 60);
   var minutes = Math.floor((t / 1000 / 60) % 60);
   var hours = Math.floor((t / (1000 * 60 * 60)) % 24);
   var days = Math.floor(t / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
   return {
     'total': t,
     'days': days,
     'hours': hours,
     'minutes': minutes,
     'seconds': seconds
   };
  },

  initializeClock : function(endTime, runCount) {
      var t = DPG_cdClockExt_v1.getTimeRemaining(endTime,runCount);
      // if(debug_dpgCDC) {console.info(t.days + " , " + t.hours + " , " + t.minutes + " , " + t.seconds);}
      // if(debug_dpgCDC) {console.info("%c isNaN", "color:purple");}
      if(isNaN(t.hours) !== true){
      // if(debug_dpgCDC) {console.info("%c is not NaN", "color:purple");}

        //change days to day if less than 2
        if(t.hours != '1'){
          jQuery('.cdc_pos1').html(t.hours);
        }else{
          jQuery('.cdc_pos1').html(t.hours);
          jQuery('.chkDay').html('day');
        }
        if(t.minutes != '1'){
          jQuery('.cdc_pos2').html(t.minutes);
        }else{
          jQuery('.cdc_pos2').html(t.minutes);
          jQuery('.chkHour').html('hour');
        }
        //jQuery('.cdc_pos2').html = ('0' + t.hours).slice(-2);
        jQuery('.cdc_pos2').html(('0' + t.minutes).slice(-2));
      }

      if(t.hours == 0) {
        //jQuery('.ldto_countdown_days').hide();
        //jQuery('.ldto_countdown_hours').show();
      } else {
        //jQuery('.ldto_countdown_hours').hide();
      }
      if (t.total <= 0) {
        clearInterval(timeinterval);
      }
    var timeinterval = setInterval(function() {
      runCount++;
      DPG_cdClockExt_v1.initializeClock(endTime, runCount);
    }, 1000);
  },

  appendHTML : function(placement) {
    if( jQuery('#ldto2_extension').length < 1 ) {
    //if(debug_dpgCDC) {console.info('%c optimizely-extension present','color:purple');}

      if(placement == '.edfs-content') {
        if(debug_dpgCDC) {console.info('%c place in unibar','color: purple');}
        jQuery(placement).prepend(extension.$html);
        jQuery('.wcd_edfs, .edfs-headline').hide();
        jQuery('.theDetails').addClass('uniBarDetails');
      } else {
        if(debug_dpgCDC) {console.info('%c place under top nav','color: purple');}
        jQuery(placement).after(extension.$html);
        jQuery('.LDTO_phase2').addClass('afterNav');
        jQuery('.cdc_container').addClass('ddCardPlusUp');
        jQuery('.enV').addClass('cardPlusUpMsg');
      }
      var extensionHtml = jQuery('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance);
    	var empBlk = extensionHtml.find('.emptyClass');
      for(var i=0;i<empBlk.length ;i++){
        if(jQuery(empBlk[i]).html().trim() === ''){
            jQuery(empBlk[i]).addClass('hide');
        }
      }
    }
  }

};

      },
      hideFn: function(event) {
        var $ = window.optimizely.get('jquery');
        var widget = event.data.config;
        widget.$id = "10566259908";
        widget.$instance = event.data.id;
        widget.$fieldDefaults = [{"name":"unitPlacement","default_value":"#topNav"},{"name":"beforeCopy","default_value":""},{"name":"text","default_value":""},{"name":"text_FR","default_value":""},{"name":"endYear","default_value":"2018"},{"name":"endMonth","default_value":"01-12"},{"name":"endDate","default_value":"01-31"},{"name":"endTime","default_value":"hh:mm:ss"},{"name":"detailsLink","default_value":""}];
        (function(widg) {
  var i = 0;
  var field;
  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {
    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];
    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(widget);
        var extension = widget;
        widget._styleTag = document.getElementById('widget-css-10566259908');
if (widget._styleTag) widget._styleTag.parentNode.removeChild(widget._styleTag);
        jQuery('#ldto2_extension').remove();

      },
    });

PluginManager.registerWidget({
      widgetId: '10612681358',

	jQuery(widget.insertPoint).html('<div class="cert_loadMsg"><h2 class="sds_font--secondary sds_font--maax sds_font-size--20 mkt_font-size--24-at-lg mkt_font-size--32-at-xl" style="color:grey">Loading...</h2><h3 class="sds_font--primary sds_font--maax sds_font-size--12 mkt_font-size--14-at-lg mkt_font-size--16-at-xl sp_sm" style="color:black">Recommended sale picks just for you.</h3></div>');
});

utils.waitForElement(certonaSchemeRes +' .certona__product-card').then(function(el){
  //build slick
  jQuery(document).on('callSlickEBBResp',function(e){
    //setTimeout(function(){
    
  	jQuery('.certona_slick').slick({
    dots: false,
  	infinite: false,
    speed: 500,
    centerMode: false,
    variableWidth: true,
    slidesToShow: 4,
		slidesToScroll: 4,
    lazyLoad: 'ondemand',
		nextArrow: '<div class="clearance-next"><img src="'+ arrowLink +'" draggable="false"></div>',
		prevArrow: '<div class="clearance-prev" ><img src="'+ arrowLink +'" draggable="false"></div>',
    responsive: [
		{
      breakpoint: 1279,
      settings: {
        slidesToShow: 4,
        slidesToScroll: 4
      }
    },
    {
      breakpoint: 1023,
      settings: {
        slidesToShow: 3,
        slidesToScroll: 3
      }
    },
    {
      breakpoint: 768,
      settings: {
        slidesToShow: 2,
        slidesToScroll: 2
      }
    }
  ]  
      
  });      
});
  
  jQuery('body').append(widget.$html);
  productBlk = jQuery(certonaSchemeRes).find('.certona__product-card');
  buildSideNavRailResponsive();
  var temp = jQuery('body').find('.CarouselBanner').detach();
  jQuery('.cert_loadMsg').hide();
  if(jQuery('.certona_abv-recs-wrapperN').length < 1){
    jQuery(insertionPoint).eq(0).prepend(temp);
    jQuery('.CarouselBanner').css('display','block');
  }
  
  function buildSideNavRailResponsive(){
	 	certona_abvWrapper = jQuery("<div class='certona_abv-recs-wrapperN'></div>");
    certona_abvWrapper.append("<div class='certona__recs-grid grid-root'></div>");
    certona_abvWrapper.find('.certona__recs-grid').append('<div class="certona_slick_Outerwrapper g-1-1"><div class="certona_slick_Innerwrapper"><div class="certona_slick_Block"><div class="certona_slick_wrapper"><div class="certona_slick"></div></div></div></div></div>');
    certona_abvWrapper.find('.certona_slick').append(productBlk); 
    certona_abvWrapper.find('.certona__product-card').removeClass('g-2-5 g-lg-1-4 g-2-3 g-lg-3-4 g-xl-4-5 g-1280-1-5');
    certona_abvWrapper.find('.certona__product-card__image').addClass('certona_above_img_wrapper');
    jQuery('.CarouselBanner').find('.certona_blk_attach').append(certona_abvWrapper);
    jQuery(document).trigger('callSlickEBBResp');
    
    jQuery(window).resize(function () {
        jQuery('.certona_slick').slick('resize');
    });

    jQuery(window).on('orientationchange', function () {
        jQuery('.certona_slick').slick('resize');
    });
}
 
});

      },
      hideFn: function(event) {
        var $ = window.optimizely.get('jquery');

        widget.$id = "10665880101";

// BEGIN React check
if( typeof gap.components === "undefined" || ( typeof gap.components !== "undefined" && gap.components != true ) ) {

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    if (location.pathname != "/buy/shopping_bag.do" && location.pathname.indexOf("/checkout/place-order/") == -1 && location.pathname != "/checkout/order.do" && location.pathname != "/checkout/orderConfirm.do" && location.hostname.indexOf("secure") == -1 && typeof wcdLib !== "undefined" && typeof wcdLib.documentReady !== "undefined" && typeof wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar !== "undefined" && typeof wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar !== "undefined" && typeof wcdLib.hasLocalStorage !== "undefined") {
        var setFooterEmailInputDefault = function(elem) {
            var input = elem;
            if (input.val() == '' && input.attr('placeholder') !== '') {
                input.val(input.attr('placeholder'));
            }
        };
        var clearFooterEmailInputDefault = function(elem) {
            var input = jQuery(elem);
            var emailValidation = ['This field is required', 'Email addresses must match'];
            if (input.val() === input.attr('placeholder') || input.val().indexOf(emailValidation) > -1) {
                input.val('');
            }
        };
        var setFooterEmailBlurFocus = function(wcdForm) {
            var email = jQuery(wcdForm + ' input[name="email"]');
            // set blur
            email.on('blur', function() {
                var elem = jQuery(this);
                setFooterEmailInputDefault(elem);
            });
            // set focus
            email.on('focus', function() {
                var elem = jQuery(this);
                clearFooterEmailInputDefault(elem);
                elem.removeClass('validationWarning');
            });
        };
        var showPopup = function() {
            // console.info('email pop up');
            var widgetHTML = document.createElement("div");
            widgetHTML.innerHTML = widget.$html;
            document.body.appendChild(widgetHTML);
            document.querySelectorAll('.optly-modal-background, .optly-modal-close').forEach(function(elem) {
                elem.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    hidePopup();
                });
            });
            //set validation on email form submit
            document.getElementById("exit_Intent_Modal_Custom").addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
                // console.info('modalButton submitted');
                e.preventDefault();
                ExitIntentEmailFormValidation.init('exit_Intent_Modal_Custom', 'id', 'basic', false);
            });
            setFooterEmailBlurFocus('#exit_Intent_Modal_Custom');
            //gidLib.setCookie(cookieName,'true',emailpopExpireTime ,'/',cookieDomain);
            wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar(cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime);
            document.querySelector('.optly-modal').style.display = 'block';
            var newEventName = optlyEventTrackingExit + '_PopUpModalFired_Optly_' + extension.variationTID;
            var newOmniEventname = optlyEventTrackingExit + '_PopUpFired_' + extension.variationTID;
            setTimeout(function(){
                wcdLib.trackValue(this, newOmniEventname, newOmniEventname, 'eVar7');
            },3000);
            window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
            window.optimizely.push({
                type: "event",
                eventName: newEventName
            });
        };
        var hidePopup = function() {
            document.querySelector('.optly-modal').style.display = 'none';
          	if(document.body.classList.contains('universal-modal--backdrop')){
              document.querySelector('.universal-modal--backdrop').style.display = 'none';
            }
            
            wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar(cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime);
        };
        var _settings = {
            shownOnce: false
        };
        var actionlnk = widget.actionLink;
        var optlyEventTrackingExit = '';
        var cookieDomain = (location.hostname.indexOf('gidapps') > -1) ? '.gidapps.com' : '.gap.com';
        var emailpopExpireTime = gidLib.getFutureDate({
            'days': '30'
        });
        /* making generic for cookie read/write*/
        var golCookie = '';
        var golLS = "";
        var emailCardStatus = '';
        var cookieName = '';
        var isUserSignedIn = gidLib.getCookie("customerId") != "" ? true : false;
        var suppressedModal = false;
        // If cookie is present and local storage supported, set cookie name/value to LS so we can remove cookie from whitelist
        if (location.host.indexOf("onol") > -1 || location.host.indexOf('oldnavy') > -1) {
            // value = 1
            cookieName = 'ONOL_hasSeenEmailpopUS';
            golCookie = gidLib.getCookie(cookieName);
            if (golCookie != 0 && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage()) wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar(cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime);
            golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar(cookieName);
            emailCardStatus = 'ON';
            var hasTIDparam = gidLib.getQuerystringParam('ev');
            if (hasTIDparam != "") {
                suppressedModal = true;
            }
            optlyEventTrackingExit = 'ON';
        } else if (location.host.indexOf("brol") > -1 || location.host.indexOf('bananarepublic.gap.com') > -1 || location.host.indexOf('bananarepublic.com') > -1) {
            // value = true
            cookieName = 'BROL_hasSeenEmailPopup';
            golCookie = gidLib.getCookie(cookieName);
            if (golCookie != 0 && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage()) wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar(cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime);
            golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar(cookieName);
            emailCardStatus = 'BR';
            optlyEventTrackingExit = 'BR';
        } else if (location.host.indexOf("gol") > -1 || location.host.indexOf('www.gap.com') > -1) {
            // value = true
            cookieName = 'GOL_has_seen_modal';
            emailpopExpireTime = gidLib.getFutureDate({
                'days': '14'
            });
            golCookie = gidLib.getCookie(cookieName);
            if (golCookie != 0 && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage()) wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar(cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime);
            golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar(cookieName);
            emailCardStatus = 'GP';
            var hasTIDparam = gidLib.getQuerystringParam('tid'); //suppress from emails
            var getTIDstring = hasTIDparam.substr(0, 4);
            if (getTIDstring == 'gpem') {
                suppressedModal = true;
            }
            optlyEventTrackingExit = 'GP';
        } else if (location.host.indexOf("atol") > -1 || location.host.indexOf('athleta') > -1) {
            // value = 1
            cookieName = 'AT_hasSeenEmailpopUS';

            golCookie = gidLib.getCookie(cookieName);
            if (golCookie != 0 && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage()) wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar(cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime);
            golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar(cookieName);

            //console.log('golCookie'+golCookie);
            emailCardStatus = 'AT';
            optlyEventTrackingExit = 'AT';
        } else if (location.host.indexOf("brfol") > -1 || location.host.indexOf('bananarepublicfactory') > -1) {
            // value = 1
            cookieName = 'BRFOL_hasSeenEmailpopUS';

            golCookie = gidLib.getCookie(cookieName);
            if (golCookie != 0 && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage()) wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar(cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime);
            golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar(cookieName);

            //console.log('golCookie'+golCookie);
            emailCardStatus = 'BRF';
            optlyEventTrackingExit = 'BRF';
        }
        var testAttributeValue = '';
        //check for email status
        var unvData = personalizationService;
        if (unvData && unvData.model.personalizationData && unvData.model.personalizationData !== null) {
            if (unvData.model.personalizationData.hasOwnProperty('personalizationInfoV1') && (unvData.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1 !== null)) {
                var unvDataInfo = unvData.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1;
                if (unvDataInfo && unvDataInfo.hasOwnProperty('featureSelections') && unvDataInfo.featureSelections !== null && typeof unvDataInfo.featureSelections !== 'undefined') {
                    if (unvDataInfo.featureSelections.hasOwnProperty('Evergreens') && unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens !== null && typeof unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens !== 'undefined') {
                        var unvSeg = unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens;
                        if (!Array.isArray(unvSeg)) {
                            unvSeg = [unvSeg];
                        }
                        if (unvSeg.length > 0) {
                            for (var i = 0; i < unvSeg.length; i++) {
                                if (unvSeg[i].AttributeName === 'EMAILUS') {
                                    testAttributeValue = unvSeg[i].AttributeValue;

                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        } // end of personalization
        //show popup
        if (!_settings.shownOnce && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() && golLS !== "true" && testAttributeValue.indexOf(emailCardStatus) == -1 && !isUserSignedIn && !suppressedModal && window.innerWidth > 767) {
            _settings.shownOnce = true;
            showPopup();
        }
        //form validation code
        var ExitIntentEmailFormValidation = {
            action: actionlnk,
            email: '',
            emailConfirm: '',
            emailReg: /\b(^(\S+@).+((\.com)|(\.net)|(\.edu)|(\.mil)|(\.gov)|(\.org)|(\.aero)|(\.arpa)|(\.asia)|(\.biz)|(\.cat)|(\.coop)|(\.info)|(\.int)|(\.jobs)|(\.mobi)|(\.name)|(\.post)|(\.pro)|(\.tel)|(\.xxx)|(\..{2,2}))$)\b/gi,
            emailValidationFields: false,
            form: '',
            formName: '',
            formId: '#',
            formClass: '.',
            formType: '',
            returnEmail: false,
            returnForm: false,
            warningClass: 'validationWarning',
            warningConfirmEmailField: '',
            warningEmailField: '',
            warningEmailMatch: 'Email addresses must match',
            warningEmailValidationFields: 'WARNING: Email warning fields not found.',
            warningFieldClassSuffix: '_error',
            warningFormIdentifier: 'WARNING: invalid email form identifier.',
            warningFormLength: 'WARNING: form does not exist.',
            warningFormType: 'WARNING: invalid form type.',
            warningInvalidEmail: 'Invalid email address',
            warningMissingFields: 'WARNING: this form is missing required fields.',
            warningRequiredField: 'This field is required',
            init: function(name, identifier, type, validationFields) {
                /*
                 * name is id or class name of form
                 * identifier is either 'id' or 'class'
                 * type is either 'basic', 'full' or 'rewards'
                 * validationFields is either true of false
                 */
                this.formType = type;
                this.emailValidationFields = validationFields;
                if (identifier === 'id') {
                    this.formName = this.formId + name;
                    this.setForm();
                } else if (identifier === 'class') {
                    this.formName = this.formClass + name;
                    this.setForm();
                } else {
                    console.info(this.warningFormIdentifier);
                }
            },
            basicValidation: function() {
                if (this.returnEmail === true) {
                    // validation is complete
                    // send the form
                    this.sendBasicForm();
                }
            },
            sendBasicForm: function() {
                // resubmit form
                var action = this.action;
                this.form.off('submit');
                this.form.on('submit', function(event) {
                    jQuery(this).attr('action', action);
                });
                this.form.submit();
                var newEventNameSubmit = optlyEventTrackingExit + '_PopUpModalSubmit_Optly_' + extension.variationTID;
                var newOmniEventnameSubmit = optlyEventTrackingExit + '_PopUpSubmit_' + extension.variationTID;
                wcdLib.trackValue(this, newOmniEventnameSubmit, newOmniEventnameSubmit, 'eVar7');
                window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
                window.optimizely.push({
                    type: "event",
                    eventName: newEventNameSubmit
                });
            },
            setForm: function() {
                this.form = (jQuery(this.formName));
                if (this.form.length === 1) {
                    // get email fields
                    this.email = jQuery(this.formName).find('input[name="email"]');
                    this.emailConfirm = this.email;
                    // check if email warning is inline or on external fields
                    if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
                        this.warningEmailField = jQuery(this.formName + ' .email' + this.warningFieldClassSuffix);
                    }
                    if (this.email.length === 1) {
                        this.validateEmail();
                    } else {
                        console.info(this.warningMissingFields);
                    }
                } else {
                    console.info(this.warningFormLength);
                }
            },
            validateEmail: function() {
                var email = this.email.val();
                var emailDefault = this.email.attr('placeholder');
                var confirm = email;
                // check if empty or default
                if (email.length > 0 && email !== emailDefault && email !== this.warningRequiredField) {
                    // check if valid email
                    // clearing regExp index
                    this.emailReg.lastIndex = 0;
                    if (this.emailReg.test(email) === true) {
                        // remove warnings from email
                        if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
                            this.warningEmailField.val('');
                        }
                        this.email.removeClass(this.warningClass);
                        // check if confirm email matches
                        if (email === confirm) {
                            // remove warnings from confirm email
                            if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
                                this.warningConfirmEmailField.val('');
                            }
                            this.returnEmail = true;
                            // check if validation is basic or full
                            if (this.formType === 'basic') {
                                this.basicValidation();
                            } else {
                                console.info(this.warningFormType);
                            }
                        } else {
                            // return false
                            this.returnEmail = false;
                        }
                    } else {
                        // add invalid email warning to email
                        if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
                            this.warningEmailField.val(this.warningInvalidEmail);
                        } else {
                            this.email.val(this.warningInvalidEmail);
                        }
                        this.email.addClass(this.warningClass);
                    }
                } else {
                    if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
                        this.warningEmailField.html(this.warningRequiredField);
                    } else {
                        this.email.val(this.warningRequiredField);
                    }
                    this.email.addClass(this.warningClass);
                }
            }
        };
    }
});

// END React check
}

      },
      hideFn: function(event) {
        var $ = window.optimizely.get('jquery');
        var widget = event.data.config;
        widget.$id = "10697633091";
        widget.$instance = event.data.id;
        widget.$fieldDefaults = [{"name":"headline1","default_value":"One More Thing Before You Go…"},{"name":"headline1Color","default_value":"rgba"},{"name":"description","default_value":"Join our email list and let's keep talking (we promise to tell you everything first)."},{"name":"secondaryClass","default_value":"heading-b"},{"name":"cta","default_value":"Sign Up Now"},{"name":"emailInputField","default_value":"Your Email Address"},{"name":"imageURL","default_value":"//www2.assets-gap.com/webcontent/0012/989/202/cn12989202.jpg"},{"name":"terms","default_value":"*Terms and Conditions"},{"name":"targetURL","default_value":""},{"name":"actionLink","default_value":""},{"name":"brandSource","default_value":"GP=N/A;BR=NA;ON=Site_Pop_Up;PL=NA;AT=NA;BRFS=NA;GPO=NA"},{"name":"br_country","default_value":"ONUS"},{"name":"termsUrl","default_value":""},{"name":"variationTID","default_value":""}];
        (function(widg) {
  var i = 0;
  var field;
  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {
    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];
    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(widget);
        var extension = widget;
        widget._styleTag = document.getElementById('widget-css-10697633091');

        jQuery('.optly-modal').remove();
      },
    });

    jQuery(document).trigger('callSlickEBBResp');

    });

    jQuery(window).on('orientationchange', function () {
        jQuery('.certona_slick').slick('resize');
    });
}

        widget._styleTag = document.createElement('style');

document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(widget._styleTag);
        var utils = optimizely.get('utils');
var debugIt = false;

if(location.href.indexOf('debugIt') > -1) {debugIt = true;}

if(debugIt){console.info('the class name', extension.className);}

utils.waitForElement('.' + extension.className)
  .then(function(elem) {
  if(debugIt){console.info('the elem', elem);}
  // Adding cookie code 5/30
  var ToolTipExpireTime = gidLib.getFutureDate({'days':'15'});
  var cookieName = 'toolTipFired';
  setTimeout(function(){
    var golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar( cookieName );
    if(debugIt){
      console.info('golLS',golLS);
      if(golLS !== "true"){
       console.info('should, will pop it');
      } else {
       console.info('will NOT pop because golLS is returning',golLS);
      }
    }

    if(golLS !== "true"){
      var theToolTipElem = document.createElement("div");
      theToolTipElem.innerHTML = widget.$html;
      theToolTipElem.classList.add('toolTipContainer');
      if(debugIt){console.info('theToolTipElem', theToolTipElem);}

      //css string updates
      var cssStrUpdate = "background-color:"+extension.bgColor+";color:"+extension.fontColor+";font-size:"+extension.fontSize+";width:"+extension.boxWidth+";top:"+extension.topSpace+";border: solid 1px "+extension.brdrColor+";"+extension.boxShad+": 2px 2px 1px "+extension.bsColor+";";
      theToolTipElem.style.cssText = cssStrUpdate;
      var hasSeenToolTip = false;
    	//custom event
      var popIt = new Event('popIt');
      //pop up tool tip
      if(debugIt){console.info('extension.CTA',extension.CTA);}
      if(extension.CTA == 'on load') {
      	if(debugIt){console.info('cta is on load');}
      }
      elem.addEventListener(extension.CTA, function(e) {
        //check if already ToolTip already hasSeenToolTip
        if(!hasSeenToolTip) {
          //pop tooltip
          console.info('pop it');
          elem.parentNode.insertBefore(theToolTipElem, elem);
          //arrow outine updates
          var arrowElem = document.querySelector(".arrow-"+extension.arrowDir);

          console.info(arrowElem);
          if(extension.arrowDir == "top") {
            arrowElem.style.borderBottomColor = extension.bgColor;

          } else {
            arrowElem.style.borderTopColor = extension.bgColor;

          }

          if(extension.CTA == "click") {
            e.preventDefault();
          }
          //close tool tip
          document.querySelector('.x-out').addEventListener('click',function() {
            theToolTipElem.parentNode.removeChild(theToolTipElem);
          });
          hasSeenToolTip = true;
        }
      });
    	//dispatch custom event
      elem.dispatchEvent(popIt);

      wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar( cookieName, "true", ToolTipExpireTime );
    	} // Added for if loop
    	else{
        if(jQuery('.dpg_toolTip').length > 0){
           jQuery('.dpg_toolTip').hide();
        }
      }
  },800);

  });

      },
      hideFn: function(event) {
        var $ = window.optimizely.get('jquery');
        var widget = event.data.config;
        widget.$id = "10739171996";
        widget.$instance = event.data.id;
        widget.$fieldDefaults = [{"name":"className","default_value":"shoppingBagCheckout"},{"name":"CTA","default_value":"click"},{"name":"ttText","default_value":"This can be text or HTML"},{"name":"bgColor","default_value":"rgba(111, 246, 130, 1)"},{"name":"brdrColor","default_value":"rgba"},{"name":"boxShad","default_value":"box-shadow"},{"name":"bsColor","default_value":"rgba"},{"name":"fontColor","default_value":"rgba(245, 10, 10, 1)"},{"name":"fontSize","default_value":".77em"},{"name":"boxWidth","default_value":"202px"},{"name":"topSpace","default_value":"-75px"},{"name":"arrowDir","default_value":"bottom"},{"name":"zontPos","default_value":"50px"}];
        (function(widg) {
  var i = 0;
  var field;
  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {
    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];
    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(widget);
        var extension = widget;
        widget._styleTag = document.getElementById('widget-css-10739171996');

var utils = window.optimizely.get('utils');
utils.waitForElement( extension.unitPlacement ).then( function( elem ) {
	document.querySelector( extension.unitPlacement ).addEventListener("click", function() {
    var html = extension.$render({ extension: extension });
    var docBody = document.querySelector('body');
    docBody.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', html );
    if( location.pathname == "/checkout/order.do") {
      docBody.className += " pos-fixed-for-popup";
    }

    var closeElements = document.querySelectorAll('.details-optly-modal-background, .details-optly-modal-close');
    if( closeElements.length > 0 ) {
      for( var i = 0; i < closeElements.length; i++ ) {
        closeElements[i].addEventListener("click", function() {
          var elementsToHide = document.querySelectorAll(".details-optly-modal-background, .universal-modal--backdrop, .details-optly-modal");
          if( elementsToHide.length > 0 ) {
            for( var j = 0; j < elementsToHide.length; j++ ) {
              elementsToHide[j].style.display = "none";
            }
          }
          if( location.pathname == "/checkout/order.do") {
            var bodyClass = document.querySelector('body').className;
            bodyClass = bodyClass.replace(" pos-fixed-for-popup","");
            document.querySelector('body').className = bodyClass;
          }
        });
      }
    }
  });
});

var utils = optimizely.get('utils');
var domain = lasAttributes? lasAttributes.domain : 'https://test.api.gaptech.com';

var spfToken = 'BOPIS';

window.buildMyStoreInfo = function(store){
  var storeHour = "no information";
  var storeAddr = "";
  var storeName = "no information";
  var clientDay = ((new Date().getDay()-1)===-1) ? 6 : (new Date().getDay()-1);

  if(store) {
    storeName = store.storeName;
    if(store.hours && store.hours[clientDay])
      storeHour = store.hours[clientDay].split(': ')[1];
    if(store.address){
      if(store.address.lines[0]) storeAddr += '<div>' + store.address.lines[0] + '</div>';
      storeAddr += '<div>';
      if(store.address.city) storeAddr += '<span>' + store.address.city + ', </span>';
      if(store.address.stateProvince) storeAddr += '<span>' + store.address.stateProvince + ', </span>';
      if(store.address.postalCode && store.address.postalCode.split('-') && store.address.postalCode.split('-')[0])
        storeAddr += '<span>' + store.address.postalCode.split('-')[0] + '</span>';
      storeAddr += '</div>';
    }
    //update 'choose a store' text
    var storeNames = document.querySelectorAll('.my-store-name');
    if(storeNames) {
    	storeNames.forEach(function(storeItem){
    	  storeItem.innerHTML = storeName;
    	});	
    }
    if(document.getElementById('dialog-triangle')) {
		document.getElementById('dialog-triangle').style.padding = '0';
		document.getElementById('dialog-triangle').innerHTML = '<div id="las-content"><div class="store-name sds_font--secondary sds_uppercase sds_font-size--18 sds_letter-spacing--1-5 sds_sp_xs">' + storeName + '</div><div class="store-addr sds_font--primary sds_font-size--16 sds_sp_lg">' + storeAddr + '</div><div class="store-hour sds_uppercase sds_font--primary sds_font-size--16 sds_sp_lg"><span class="sds_font--secondary sds_font-size--18">hours today:</span><br>' + storeHour + '</div><div class="locator-link sds_font--secondary sds_font-size--16 sds_uppercase sds_letter-spacing--1-0"><a href="/customerService/storeLocator.do?kwid=1&sem=false">find other stores</a></div></div>';    	
    }
    if(document.getElementById('las-content'))
    	document.getElementById('las-content').style.padding = '1em';
  }
};

window.useBopisLS = function(){
  setTimeout(function(){
  	buildMyStoreInfo(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('bopis')).selectedStore);  
  },200);
};

window.myStoreDisableButton = function(){
  var geoButton = document.getElementById('geo-button');
  var findButton = document.getElementById('zipcode-cta');
  if(geoButton) {
	geoButton.classList.remove('sds_btn--border');
	geoButton.classList.add('sds_color-background--g4');
	geoButton.innerText = 'locating your store';  	
  }
  if(findButton) findButton.classList.add('sds_color-background--g4');
  setTimeout(function(){
  	if(jQuery('#dialog-triangle'))
    	jQuery('#dialog-triangle').prepend('<div class="my-store-overlay"><div class="my-store-spinner"></div></div>');
  }, 200);
  return;
};

window.myStoreGeoSuccess = function(position){
  var latitude  = position.coords.latitude;
  var longitude = position.coords.longitude;
  var url = domain + route + '?latitude=' + latitude + '&longitude=' + longitude + '&marketCode=' + marketCode + '&brandCode=' + brandCode + '&applicationsEnabled=' + application + '&includes=' + bopisFields;
  var img = new Image();
  fetch(url, {
    headers: {
      ApiKey: key
   }
  }).then(function(response){
       if(response.status === 200)
         return response.json();
       else
         new Error(response.statusText);
      }).then(function(data){
        buildMyStoreInfo(data.stores[0]);
    });
};

window.myStoreGeoError = function(){
  var storeNames = document.querySelectorAll('.my-store-name');
  if(storeNames){
	storeNames.forEach(function(storeItem){
	  storeItem.innerHTML = "Unable to retrieve your location";
	});  	
  }
  if(document.getElementById('widget-flyout'))
    document.getElementById('widget-flyout').remove();
  if(document.getElementById('drop-pin'))
    document.getElementById('drop-pin').classList.remove('sds_cursor-pointer');
  if(document.getElementById('initial-state'))
    document.getElementById('initial-state').classList.remove('sds_cursor-pointer');
};

window.zipcodeAction = function(event){
  var zipcode, isValidZip;
  if((event.type=="keypress" && event.key=="Enter")||(event.type=="click")) {
  	if(document.getElementById('zipcode-input'))
    	zipcode = document.getElementById('zipcode-input').value;
    isValidZip = /(^\d{5}$)|(^\d{5}-\d{4}$)/.test(zipcode);
    if(isValidZip) {
      myStoreDisableButton();
      var urlZip = domain + route + '?zipCode=' + zipcode + '&marketCode=' + marketCode + '&brandCode=' + brandCode + '&applicationsEnabled=' + application + '&includes=' + bopisFields;
      fetch(urlZip, {
        headers: {
          ApiKey: key
        }
      }).then(function(response){
        if(response.status === 200)
          return response.json();
        else
          new Error(response.statusText);
      }).then(function(data){
        buildMyStoreInfo(data.stores[0]);        
      });
    } else {
      document.getElementById('zipcode-input').value = "";
    }
  }
};

window.toggleMyStoreFlyout = function(){
  var elem = document.getElementById('widget-flyout'); 
  if(elem) {
    if(elem.classList.contains('hide-me')) {
      elem.classList.remove('hide-me');
      if(window.screen.width < 768 && document.getElementById('mobile-down-arrow')){
        document.getElementById('mobile-down-arrow').style.transform = 'translate(3px) rotate(-135deg)';
      }
      if(document.getElementById('geo-button')) {
        document.getElementById('geo-button').onclick = function(){
          myStoreDisableButton();
          if (!navigator.geolocation){
            elem.innerHTML = "<p>Geolocation is not supported by your browser</p>";
          }
          navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(myStoreGeoSuccess, myStoreGeoError);
        };
      }
    }else {
      elem.classList.add('hide-me');
      if(window.screen.width < 768 && document.getElementById('mobile-down-arrow')){
        document.getElementById('mobile-down-arrow').style.transform = 'translate(3px, -2px) rotate(45deg)';
      }
    }  
  	jQuery(window).on('click', function(event){
  	  if(!(document.getElementById('my-store-widget').contains(event.target)) && event.target.id != 'geo-button')
  	    elem.classList.add('hide-me');
  	});
  	/*jQuery(window).on('scroll', function(){
  	  elem.classList.add('hide-me');
  	});*/
    jQuery('.nav-trigger--inner').on('click', function(){
     elem.classList.add('hide-me');
		});
  }
};

   window.addEventListener('orientationchange', function() {
    var elem;
    var widget = jQuery('.my-store-widget-wrapper');
    if(widget) {
      elem = widget.detach();
      if(window.screen.width > 1023) {
        if(jQuery('.brand_old-navy .brand-bar--left'))
          jQuery('.brand_old-navy .brand-bar--left').prepend(elem);
      }else {
        if(jQuery('header.brand-bar.brand-bar--theme--.nav-shiftee.brand-bar_search-always-exposed'))
          jQuery('header.brand-bar.brand-bar--theme--.nav-shiftee.brand-bar_search-always-exposed').after(elem);          
      }
    }
  });
  
	if(window.screen.width > 1023) {
	  utils.waitForElement('.brand-bar .brand-bar--left')
	  .then(function(elem) {
	    jQuery('.universal-nav').css('z-index', '400');
	    elem.insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
      if(localStorage.getItem('bopis')) useBopisLS();
			document.getElementById('initial-state').onclick = function(){toggleMyStoreFlyout();};
      document.getElementById('drop-pin').onclick = function(){toggleMyStoreFlyout();};
  		jQuery(document.body).on('click','.bopis-store__button',function(){useBopisLS();});
	  });  
	} else {
	  utils.waitForElement('header.brand-bar.brand-bar--theme--.nav-shiftee.brand-bar_search-always-exposed')
	  .then(function(elem) {
	    elem.insertAdjacentHTML('afterend', extension.$html);
      if(localStorage.getItem('bopis')) useBopisLS();
			document.getElementById('initial-state').onclick = function(){toggleMyStoreFlyout();};
      document.getElementById('drop-pin').onclick = function(){toggleMyStoreFlyout();};
  		jQuery(document.body).on('click','.bopis-store__button',function(){useBopisLS();});
	  });
	}
}
      },
      hideFn: function(event) {
        var $ = window.optimizely.get('jquery');
        var widget = event.data.config;
        widget.$id = "10765222276";
        widget.$instance = event.data.id;
        widget.$fieldDefaults = [{"name":"icon_stores_on","default_value":"//www.gap.com/optimizely/063982ff54734b3695fa676edf78305e.svg"},{"name":"bopis_small","default_value":"//www.gap.com/optimizely/74fa21452ea34bf7b2d8bc13a33ab1e8.svg"},{"name":"bopis_large","default_value":"//www.gap.com/optimizely/bc047b3153154c2ab29bcce6f3007c2d.svg"}];
        (function(widg) {
  var i = 0;
  var field;
  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {
    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];
    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(widget);
        var extension = widget;
        widget._styleTag = document.getElementById('widget-css-10765222276');
if (widget._styleTag) widget._styleTag.parentNode.removeChild(widget._styleTag);
        //after apply js

if (extensionHtml) extensionHtml.remove();

      },
    });
