var utils = window.optimizely.get('utils');

utils.waitForElement(widget.insertPoint).then(function(el){
	jQuery(widget.insertPoint).html('<div class="cert_loadMsg"><h2 class="sds_font--secondary sds_font--maax sds_font-size--20 mkt_font-size--24-at-lg mkt_font-size--32-at-xl" style="color:grey">Loading...</h2><h3 class="sds_font--primary sds_font--maax sds_font-size--12 mkt_font-size--14-at-lg mkt_font-size--16-at-xl sp_sm" style="color:black">Recommended new arrival picks just for you.</h3></div>');
});

utils.waitForElement(certonaSchemeRes +' .certona__product-card').then(function(el){
  //build slick
  jQuery(document).on('callSlickEBBResp',function(e){
    //setTimeout(function(){
    
  	jQuery('.certona_slick').slick({
    dots: false,
  	infinite: false,
    speed: 500,
    centerMode: false,
    variableWidth: true,
    slidesToShow: 5,
		slidesToScroll: 5,
    lazyLoad: 'ondemand',
		nextArrow: '<div class="clearance-next"><img src="'+ arrowLink +'" draggable="false"></div>',
		prevArrow: '<div class="clearance-prev" ><img src="'+ arrowLink +'" draggable="false"></div>',
    responsive: [
		{
      breakpoint: 1279,
      settings: {
        slidesToShow: 4,
        slidesToScroll: 4
      }
    },
    {
      breakpoint: 1023,
      settings: {
        slidesToShow: 3,
        slidesToScroll: 3
      }
    },
    {
      breakpoint: 768,
      settings: {
        slidesToShow: 2,
        slidesToScroll: 2
      }
    }
  ]  
      
  });      
});
  
  jQuery('body').append(widget.$html);
  productBlk = jQuery(certonaSchemeRes).find('.certona__product-card');
  buildSideNavRailResponsive();
  var temp = jQuery('body').find('.CarouselBanner').detach();
  jQuery('.cert_loadMsg').hide();
  if(jQuery('.certona_abv-recs-wrapperN').length < 1){
    jQuery(insertionPoint).eq(0).prepend(temp);
    jQuery('.CarouselBanner').css('display','block');
  }
  
  function buildSideNavRailResponsive(){
	 	certona_abvWrapper = jQuery("<div class='certona_abv-recs-wrapperN'></div>");
    certona_abvWrapper.append("<div class='certona__recs-grid grid-root'></div>");
    certona_abvWrapper.find('.certona__recs-grid').append('<div class="certona_slick_Outerwrapper g-1-1"><div class="certona_slick_Innerwrapper"><div class="certona_slick_Block"><div class="certona_slick_wrapper"><div class="certona_slick"></div></div></div></div></div>');
    certona_abvWrapper.find('.certona_slick').append(productBlk); 
    certona_abvWrapper.find('.certona__product-card').removeClass('g-2-5 g-lg-1-4 g-2-3 g-lg-3-4 g-xl-4-5 g-1280-1-5');
    certona_abvWrapper.find('.certona__product-card__image').addClass('certona_above_img_wrapper');
    jQuery('.CarouselBanner').find('.certona_blk_attach').append(certona_abvWrapper);
    jQuery(document).trigger('callSlickEBBResp');
    
    jQuery(window).resize(function () {
        jQuery('.certona_slick').slick('resize');
    });

    jQuery(window).on('orientationchange', function () {
        jQuery('.certona_slick').slick('resize');
    });
}
 
});

        var utils = window.optimizely.get('utils');
var lazyLoad = extension.lazyLoad;

if( lazyLoad == "true" ) {

  if (document.attachEvent ? document.readyState === "complete" : document.readyState !== "loading"){
        lazyLoadExtension();
  } else {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', lazyLoadExtension);
  }
}
else {

  utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
    if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {
      console.log("lazy load off, ext added");
      document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
    }
  });
}

function lazyLoadExtension(){
 console.log("lazyLoadExtension found");
 
    // Pull row name out of unit placement
    var rowPlacement = extension.unitPlacement.split(" ")[0];
    rowPlacement = rowPlacement.substr(1);

    // Has row placement loaded already
    console.log("OPT - lazy load is on for row " + rowPlacement );
    console.log("wcd", window.wcd );
    console.log("flag", window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags.hasOwnProperty ); 
    
    console.log( typeof window.wcd !== "undefined" && typeof window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader !== "undefined" && typeof window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags !== "undefined" && window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags.hasOwnProperty( rowPlacement ) == false );

    if( typeof window.wcd !== "undefined" && typeof window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader !== "undefined" && typeof window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags !== "undefined" && window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags.hasOwnProperty( rowPlacement ) == false ) {

      //console.log("container " + rowPlacement + " has not been seen yet “);

jQuery( document ).on("container--" + rowPlacement + ":loaded", function() { //convert to webAPI
            
        utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
          if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {

            console.log("container " + rowPlacement + " event fired, ext added");
          document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
          }
        });
        
      });
    }
    else {

      utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
        if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {
         
            console.log("container " + rowPlacement + " already seen, ext added");
          document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);

        }
      });

    }
}

      },

      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(widget);
        widget.$html = _template.render({ widget: widget, extension: widget })
        var extension = widget;
        
        var utils = window.optimizely.get('utils');
var lazyLoad = extension.lazyLoad;

if( lazyLoad == "true" ) {

  if (document.attachEvent ? document.readyState === "complete" : document.readyState !== "loading"){
        lazyLoadExtension();
  } else {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', lazyLoadExtension);
  }
}
else {

  utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
    if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {
      console.log("lazy load off, ext added to "+ extension.unitPlacement);
      document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
    }
  });
}

function lazyLoadExtension(){
 console.log("lazyLoadExtension found");
 
    // Pull row name out of unit placement
    var rowPlacement = extension.unitPlacement.split(" ")[0];
    rowPlacement = rowPlacement.substr(1);

    // Has row placement loaded already
    console.log("OPT - lazy load is on for row " + rowPlacement );
    console.log("wcd", window.wcd );
    console.log("flag", window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags.hasOwnProperty ); 
    
    console.log( typeof window.wcd !== "undefined" && typeof window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader !== "undefined" && typeof window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags !== "undefined" && window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags.hasOwnProperty( rowPlacement ) == false );

    if( typeof window.wcd !== "undefined" && typeof window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader !== "undefined" && typeof window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags !== "undefined" && window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags.hasOwnProperty( rowPlacement ) == false ) {

      //console.log("container " + rowPlacement + " has not been seen yet “);

jQuery( document ).on("container--" + rowPlacement + ":loaded", function() { //convert to webAPI
            
        utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
          if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {

            console.log("container " + rowPlacement + " event fired, ext added");
          	document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
          }
        });
        
      });
    }
    else {

      utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
        if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {
         
            console.log("container " + rowPlacement + " already seen, ext added");
          	document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);

        }
      });

    }
}


      },

		cookieName = 'ONOL_hasSeenEmailpopUS';

  	golCookie = gidLib.getCookie( cookieName );
		if( golCookie != 0 && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() ) wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar( cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime );
		golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar( cookieName );

    emailCardStatus = 'ON';
    var hasTIDparam = gidLib.getQuerystringParam('ev');
    if( hasTIDparam != "" ) {
    	suppressedModal = true;
    }
    optlyEventTrackingExit = 'ON';

  }

  else if(location.host.indexOf("brol") > -1 || location.host.indexOf('bananarepublic') > -1){
    // value = true
		cookieName = 'BROL_hasSeenEmailAquisition';

    golCookie = gidLib.getCookie( cookieName );
		if( golCookie != 0 && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() ) wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar( cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime );
		golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar( cookieName );

    emailCardStatus = 'BR';
    optlyEventTrackingExit ='BR';

  }

  else if(location.host.indexOf("gol") > -1 || location.host.indexOf('www.gap.com') > -1){
    // value = true
		cookieName = 'GOL_has_seen_modal';
    emailpopExpireTime = gidLib.getFutureDate({'days':'14'});

    golCookie = gidLib.getCookie( cookieName );
		if( golCookie != 0 && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() ) wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar( cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime );
		golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar( cookieName );

    emailCardStatus = 'GP';
    var hasTIDparam = gidLib.getQuerystringParam('tid'); //suppress from emails
		var getTIDstring = hasTIDparam.substr(0, 4);
    if(getTIDstring == 'gpem'){
      suppressedModal = true;
    }
    optlyEventTrackingExit = 'GP';
  }

  else if(location.host.indexOf("atol") > -1 || location.host.indexOf('athleta') > -1){
    // value = 1
		cookieName = 'AT_hasSeenEmailpopUS';

		golCookie = gidLib.getCookie( cookieName );
		if( golCookie != 0 && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() ) wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar( cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime );
		golLS = wcdLib.getLocalStorageVar( cookieName );

    emailCardStatus = 'AT';
    optlyEventTrackingExit = 'AT';
  }

	  var testAttributeValue = '';


	  if (widget.injectionType == "exit") {

	    jQuery('body').mouseleave(function(e) {

	      var unvData = personalizationService;
	    if(unvData && unvData.model.personalizationData && unvData.model.personalizationData !== null){
	        if(unvData.model.personalizationData.hasOwnProperty('personalizationInfoV1')&&	(unvData.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1!==null)){
	          var unvDataInfo = unvData.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1;
	          if(unvDataInfo && unvDataInfo.hasOwnProperty('featureSelections') && unvDataInfo.featureSelections!==null && typeof unvDataInfo.featureSelections!=='undefined'){
	            if(unvDataInfo.featureSelections.hasOwnProperty('Evergreens') && unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens !==null && typeof unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens!=='undefined' ){
	              var unvSeg = unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens;
	              if(!Array.isArray(unvSeg)){
	                  unvSeg =[unvSeg];
	              }
	              if(unvSeg.length > 0){
	                for(var i=0;i< unvSeg.length; i++){
	                  if(unvSeg[i].AttributeName ==='EMAILUS'){
	                    testAttributeValue = unvSeg[i].AttributeValue;

	                  }
	                }
	              }
	            }
	          }
	        }
	    } // end of personalization

	      if(e.clientY < 0){
        if (!_settings.shownOnce && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() && golLS !== "true" && testAttributeValue.indexOf(emailCardStatus) == -1 && !isUserSignedIn && !suppressedModal && jQuery(window).width() > 767) {
	          _settings.shownOnce = true;
	          showPopup();
	          var newOmniEventname = widget.popUp_Fired +'_PopUpFired';
	          //trackValue(this,newOmniEventname,newOmniEventname,'eVar6');
	          wcdLib.trackValue(this,newOmniEventname,newOmniEventname,'eVar6');
	        }
	      }
	    });

	  }

	  /* adding idle block of code */
	  else if(widget.injectionType == "idle"){
	  	var idleState = false;
	  	var idleTimer = null;
	  	var fireModalOnIdle = false;
	  	jQuery('*').bind('mousemove click mouseup mousedown keydown keypress keyup submit change mouseenter scroll resize dblclick', function () {
	    	clearTimeout(idleTimer);
	      if (idleState === true) {
	        //console.log('reset');
	        fireModalOnIdle = false;
	      }
	    	idleState = false;
	      idleTimer = setTimeout(function () {
	        fireModalOnIdle = true;
	        idleState = true;
        if (!_settings.shownOnce && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() && golLS !== "true" && testAttributeValue.indexOf(emailCardStatus) == -1 && !isUserSignedIn && !suppressedModal && jQuery(window).width() > 767) 	{
	            _settings.shownOnce = true;
	            showPopup();
	            var newOmniEventname = widget.popUp_Fired +'_PopUpFired';
	          	wcdLib.trackValue(this,newOmniEventname,newOmniEventname,'eVar6');
	          //console.log('fire');
	        }
	      }, widget.idleTimeWait);
	  	});

	  	jQuery("body").trigger("mousemove");
	  }

	  /* start of product view count*/
	  else if(widget.injectionType == "pdpView"){
	    jQuery('body').mouseleave(function(e) {
	      if(e.clientY < 0){
	      	var prodViewCnt = gidLib.getCookie('GPProductViewCount');
	    		prodViewCnt = Number(prodViewCnt);
      	if (!_settings.shownOnce && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() && golLS !== "true" && testAttributeValue.indexOf(emailCardStatus) == -1 &&  !isUserSignedIn && !suppressedModal && jQuery(window).width() > 767 && (prodViewCnt > widget.pdpViewCount ||prodViewCnt == widget.pdpViewCount )){
	          _settings.shownOnce = true;
	          showPopup();
	    		}
	      }
	    });
	  }
	  /*end of PD view count logic*/

	  /* end of idle mouse logic */
	  else {
	    jQuery(document).ready(function() {

	      var unvData = personalizationService;
	    if(unvData && unvData.model.personalizationData && unvData.model.personalizationData !== null){
	        if(unvData.model.personalizationData.hasOwnProperty('personalizationInfoV1')&&	(unvData.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1!==null)){
	          var unvDataInfo = unvData.model.personalizationData.personalizationInfoV1;
	          if(unvDataInfo && unvDataInfo.hasOwnProperty('featureSelections') && unvDataInfo.featureSelections!==null && typeof unvDataInfo.featureSelections!=='undefined'){
	            if(unvDataInfo.featureSelections.hasOwnProperty('Evergreens') && unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens !==null && typeof unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens!=='undefined' ){
	              var unvSeg = unvDataInfo.featureSelections.Evergreens;
	              if(!Array.isArray(unvSeg)){
	                  unvSeg =[unvSeg];
	              }
	              if(unvSeg.length > 0){
	                for(var i=0;i< unvSeg.length; i++){
	                  if(unvSeg[i].AttributeName ==='EMAILUS'){
	                    testAttributeValue = unvSeg[i].AttributeValue;

	                  }
	                }
	              }
	            }
	          }
	        }
	    } // end of personalization

    if (!_settings.shownOnce && wcdLib.hasLocalStorage() && golLS !== "true" && testAttributeValue.indexOf(emailCardStatus) == -1 && !isUserSignedIn && !suppressedModal && jQuery(window).width() > 767) {
	        _settings.shownOnce = true;
	        showPopup();
	      }
	    });

	  }

	  function showPopup() {
	   // document.cookie = "has_seen_modal=true";
    //gidLib.setCookie(cookieName,'true',emailpopExpireTime ,'/',cookieDomain);
      getLocaleLang(localeLang);
		wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar( cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime );
	    jQuery('.optly-modal').css("display", "block");
	    jQuery('body').css("overflow", "hidden"); //keep background from scrolling

	    var newEventName = 'ON_ModalFiredOptly';
	    var newOmniEventname = widget.popUp_Fired +'_PopUpFired';

	    //MA tag to wait for trigger
	    jQuery (document).on('wcd_tealiumTagFire:ready', function() {
	      wcdLib.trackValue(this,newOmniEventname,newOmniEventname,'eVar6');
	    });

	    window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
			window.optimizely.push({
	      type: "event",
	      eventName: newEventName
			});
	  }

	  function hidePopup() {
	    jQuery('.optly-modal').css("display", "none");
	    jQuery('.universal-modal--backdrop').css("display", "none");
	    jQuery('body').css("overflow", "auto"); //allow background scroll
    //gidLib.setCookie(cookieName,'true',emailpopExpireTime ,'/',cookieDomain);
		wcdLib.setLocalStorageVar( cookieName, "true", emailpopExpireTime );
	  }

	var ExitIntentEmailFormValidation = {
		action: actionlnk,
		email: '',
		emailConfirm: '',
		emailReg: /\b(^(\S+@).+((\.com)|(\.net)|(\.edu)|(\.mil)|(\.gov)|(\.org)|(\.aero)|(\.arpa)|(\.asia)|(\.biz)|(\.cat)|(\.coop)|(\.info)|(\.int)|(\.jobs)|(\.mobi)|(\.name)|(\.post)|(\.pro)|(\.tel)|(\.xxx)|(\..{2,2}))$)\b/gi,
		emailValidationFields: false,
		form: '',
		formName: '',
		formId: '#',
		formClass: '.',
		formType: '',
		returnEmail: false,
		returnForm: false,
		warningClass: 'validationWarning',
		warningConfirmEmailField: '',
		warningEmailField: '',
		warningEmailMatch: 'Email addresses must match',
		warningEmailValidationFields: 'WARNING: Email warning fields not found.',
		warningFieldClassSuffix: '_error',
		warningFormIdentifier: 'WARNING: invalid email form identifier.',
		warningFormLength: 'WARNING: form does not exist.',
		warningFormType: 'WARNING: invalid form type.',
		warningInvalidEmail: 'Invalid email address',
    warningInvalidEmailFr: 'Adresse électronique non valide',
		warningMissingFields: 'WARNING: this form is missing required fields.',
		warningRequiredField: 'This field is required',
		init: function(name, identifier, type, validationFields) {
			/*
			* name is id or class name of form
			* identifier is either 'id' or 'class'
			* type is either 'basic', 'full' or 'rewards'
			* validationFields is either true of false
			*/
			this.formType = type;
			this.emailValidationFields = validationFields;
			if (identifier === 'id') {
				this.formName = this.formId + name;
				this.setForm();
			} else if (identifier === 'class') {
				this.formName = this.formClass + name;
				this.setForm();
			} else {
				console.info(this.warningFormIdentifier);
			}
		},
		basicValidation: function() {

			if (this.returnEmail === true) {
				// validation is complete
				// send the form
				this.sendBasicForm();
			}
		},
		sendBasicForm: function() {
			// resubmit form
			var action = this.action;
			this.form.off('submit');
			this.form.on('submit', function(event) {
				jQuery(this).attr('action', action);
	      event.preventDefault();
	      //cross domain post hack
	      //create new form paramaters in iframe
	      var brandCountryCode = document.getElementsByName("brand_country_code")[0].value;
	      var langPref = (settingLocale == 'CA_FR')? 'CA_FR' : document.getElementsByName("lang_pref")[0].value;
	      var targetUrl = document.getElementsByName("targetURL")[0].value;
	      //var srcSpc = document.getElementsByName("src_spfc_cd")[0].value;
	      var srcSpc = jQuery('#exit_Intent_Modal_Custom').find('[name="src_spfc_cd"]')[0].value;

	      var theEmail = document.getElementById("email-ftr").value;
	      formParams = [
				  {"name": "brand_country_code", "value": brandCountryCode, "type": "hidden"},
				  {"name": "lang_pref", "value": langPref, "type": "hidden"},
				  {"name": "src_gnrc_cd", "value": "WEBSITE EMAIL SIGNUP", "type": "hidden"},
				  {"name": "src_spfc_cd", "value": srcSpc, "type": "hidden"},
				  {"name": "email", "value": theEmail, "type": "email"},
	        // {"name": "targetURL","value":targetURL, "type":"hidden"}
				];
	      ExitIntentEmailFormValidation.makeCrossDomainPost(formParams, ExitIntentEmailFormValidation.createThankYouPage);

	    });
			this.form.submit();
		},
		makeCrossDomainPost: function(formParms, callback) {
	    console.info('%c   crossDomainPost','color:#bada55;background:url(http://www.neilsalazar.com/images/nslogov24d.png) no-repeat;background-size:13%;background-position:left top');

			var theAction = document.getElementById("exit_Intent_Modal_Custom").action;
			var iframe = document.createElement("iframe");
			var uniqueString = "ETLI3mrCzAq83v8uceg6XUT0wfcGa5Fo";

			document.body.appendChild(iframe);
			iframe.style.display = "none";
			iframe.contentWindow.name = uniqueString;

			var form = document.createElement("form");
			form.target = uniqueString;
			form.action = theAction;
			form.method = "POST";
			form.className = "email_acqui_modal";
	    // form.onsubmit = "return makeAjaxCall()";

			for(x=0;x<formParams.length;x++) {
				var input = document.createElement("input");
				input.type = formParams[x].type;
				input.name = formParams[x].name;
				input.value = formParams[x].value;
				form.appendChild(input);
			}

			document.body.appendChild(form);
	    form.submit();
	    jQuery('.emailAcquiForm').hide();
	    jQuery('.thinkingWrap').show();
      if(settingLocale == 'CA_FR'){
        jQuery('.enV').hide();
        jQuery('.frV').css('display','inline-block');
        jQuery('.frV_inline').css('display','inline');
      }
			callback();
		},
		createThankYouPage: function() {
	    var newEventNameSubmit = 'ON_PopUpModalSubmit_Optly';
	    var newOmniEventnameSubmit = widget.popUp_Fired_Submit +'_PopUpSubmit';
	    setTimeout(function(){
	    	//trackValue(this,newOmniEventnameSubmit,newOmniEventnameSubmit,'eVar7');
	      wcdLib.trackValue(this,newOmniEventnameSubmit,newOmniEventnameSubmit,'eVar7');
	    },1500);


	    window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
			window.optimizely.push({
	      type: "event",
	      eventName: newEventNameSubmit
			});
			
			setTimeout(function() {
	      jQuery('.thinkingWrap').hide();
	      jQuery('.thankYouWrapper').show();
        if(settingLocale == 'CA_FR'){
          jQuery('.enV').hide();
          jQuery('.frV').css('display','inline-block');
          jQuery('.frV_inline').css('display','inline');
        }
	    },1000);
			
		},
		sendToPrefPage: function() {
			jQuery('.updatePrefsLink').click(function(e) {
				e.preventDefault();
				var input = document.createElement("input");
				input.type = "hidden";
				input.name = "targetURL";
				// input.value = document.getElementsByName("targetURL")[0].value;
				input.value = jQuery('#exit_Intent_Modal_Custom').find('[name="targetURL"]').attr('value');
				var prefForm = document.getElementsByClassName('email_acqui_modal')[0];
				prefForm.appendChild(input);
				prefForm.setAttribute('target','_blank');
				prefForm.submit();
				jQuery('.optly-modal-close').click();
			});
		},
		setForm: function() {
			this.form = (jQuery(this.formName));
			if (this.form.length === 1) {
				// get email fields
				//this.email = jQuery(this.formName + ' input[name="email"]');
	      this.email = jQuery(this.formName).find('input[name="email"]');
				this.emailConfirm = this.email;
				// check if email warning is inline or on external fields
				if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
					this.warningEmailField = jQuery(this.formName + ' .email' + this.warningFieldClassSuffix);
				}
				if (this.email.length === 1) {
					this.validateEmail();
				} else {
					console.info(this.warningMissingFields);
				}
			} else {
				console.info(this.warningFormLength);
			}
		},
		validateEmail: function() {
			var email = this.email.val();
			var emailDefault = this.email.attr('placeholder');
			var confirm = email;

			// check if empty or default
			if (email.length > 0 && email !== emailDefault && email !== this.warningRequiredField) {
				// check if valid email
				// clearing regExp index
				this.emailReg.lastIndex = 0;
				if (this.emailReg.test(email) === true) {
					// remove warnings from email
					if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
						this.warningEmailField.val('');
					}
					this.email.removeClass(this.warningClass);

					// check if confirm email matches
					if (email === confirm) {
						// remove warnings from confirm email
						if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
							this.warningConfirmEmailField.val('');
						}
						this.returnEmail = true;

						// check if validation is basic or full
						if (this.formType === 'basic') {
							this.basicValidation();
						} else {
							console.info(this.warningFormType);
						}

					} else {
						// add warning to confirm email
						/*if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
							this.warningConfirmEmailField.val(this.warningEmailMatch);
						} */
						//this.emailConfirm.addClass(this.warningClass);

						// return false
						this.returnEmail = false;

					}
				} else {
					// add invalid email warning to email
					if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
            if(localeLang.indexOf('fr_CA') > -1){
              this.warningEmailField.val(this.warningInvalidEmailFr);
            }else{
              this.warningEmailField.val(this.warningInvalidEmail);
            }
						//this.warningEmailField.val(this.warningInvalidEmail);
					}else{
						//this.email.val(this.warningInvalidEmail);
            if(localeLang.indexOf('fr_CA') > -1){
              this.email.val(this.warningInvalidEmailFr);
            }else{
              this.email.val(this.warningInvalidEmail);
            }
					}

					this.email.addClass(this.warningClass);
				}
			} else {
				if (this.emailValidationFields === true) {
					this.warningEmailField.html(this.warningRequiredField);
				} else {
					this.email.val(this.warningRequiredField);
					//this.emailConfirm.val(this.warningRequiredField);
				}

				this.email.addClass(this.warningClass);
				//this.emailConfirm.addClass(this.warningClass);
			}
		}
	};
	var setFooterEmailInputDefault = function(elem) {
		var input = elem;
		if (input.val() == '' && input.attr('placeholder') !== '') {
			input.val(input.attr('placeholder'));
		}
	};
	var clearFooterEmailInputDefault = function(elem) {
		var input = jQuery(elem);
		var emailValidation = ['This field is required', 'Email addresses must match'];
		if (input.val() === input.attr('placeholder') || input.val().indexOf(emailValidation) > -1) {
			input.val('');
		}
	};
	var setFooterEmailBlurFocus = function(wcdForm) {
		var email = jQuery(wcdForm + ' input[name="email"]');
		// set blur
		email.on('blur', function() {
			var elem = jQuery(this);
			setFooterEmailInputDefault(elem);
		});
	  //clear 'nitpicky' validation
	  email.on('focus keydown click', function() {
	    var elem = jQuery(this);
	    if(elem.hasClass('validationWarning')) {
	      clearFooterEmailInputDefault(elem);
	      console.info('%c kp & click', 'color:blue');
	      elem.removeClass('validationWarning');
	    }
	  });

	};

	//set validation on email form submit
		jQuery("#exit_Intent_Modal_Custom").on('submit keydown', function(e){
	    //console.info('modalButton submitted');
	    if (e.keyCode === 13) {
	      e.preventDefault();
	      ExitIntentEmailFormValidation.init('exit_Intent_Modal_Custom','id','basic',false);
	    }
	  });
		jQuery("#exit_ModalButton").on('click', function(e){
	    //console.info('modalButton submitted');
	      e.preventDefault();
	      ExitIntentEmailFormValidation.init('exit_Intent_Modal_Custom','id','basic',false);
	  });
	  setFooterEmailBlurFocus('#exit_Intent_Modal_Custom');

	}

}); // end of document ready

//}

      },
      hideFn: function(event) {
        var $ = window.optimizely.get('jquery');
        var widget = event.data.config;
        widget.$id = "11036106199";
        widget.$instance = event.data.id;
        widget.$fieldDefaults = [{"name":"headline1Class","default_value":"optly-main-header_gap"},{"name":"headline1","default_value":""},{"name":"secondaryClass","default_value":"heading-b"},{"name":"description","default_value":""},{"name":"cta","default_value":""},{"name":"imageURL","default_value":"//www2.assets-gap.com/webcontent/0012/989/202/cn12989202.jpg"},{"name":"injectionType","default_value":"entry"},{"name":"terms","default_value":"*Terms and Conditions"},{"name":"targetURL","default_value":""},{"name":"actionLink","default_value":""},{"name":"brandSource","default_value":"GP=N/A;BR=NA;ON=Site_Pop_Up;PL=NA;AT=NA;BRFS=NA;GPO=NA"},{"name":"br_country","default_value":"ONUS"},{"name":"src_genGapFooter1","default_value":"<input type=\"HIDDEN\" id=\"src_genBRFooter\" value=\"site_footer_02252015\" name=\"src_gnrc_cd\">\n<input type=\"HIDDEN\" id=\"src_gen\" value=\"site_footer_02252015\" name=\"src_gnrc_cd\">"},{"name":"idleTimeWait","default_value":40000},{"name":"headline1CSS","default_value":""},{"name":"headline2CSS","default_value":""},{"name":"termsUrl","default_value":""},{"name":"pdpViewCount","default_value":""},{"name":"thankYouCopy","default_value":"For signing up!"},{"name":"thankYouCopy2","default_value":"Update your preferences"},{"name":"updateCopy","default_value":"here"},{"name":"prefPageUrl","default_value":""},{"name":"ctaLink","default_value":""},{"name":"popUp_Fired","default_value":""},{"name":"popUp_Fired_Submit","default_value":""},{"name":"emailPlaceHolder","default_value":"Your Email Address"}];
        (function(widg) {
  var i = 0;
  var field;
  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {
    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];
    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(widget);
        var extension = widget;
        widget._styleTag = document.getElementById('widget-css-11036106199');
if (widget._styleTag) widget._styleTag.parentNode.removeChild(widget._styleTag);
        jQuery('.optly-modal').remove();
      },
    });

PluginManager.registerWidget({
      widgetId: '11081911260',
      showFn: function(event) {
        var $ = window.optimizely.get('jquery');
        var widget = event.data.config;
        var _template = new Hogan(function(c,p,i) {var t=this;t.b(i=i||"");t.b("<div id=\"optimizely-extension-");t.b(t.v(t.d("extension.$instance",c,p,0)));t.b("\" class=\"sds_tx_left sds_relative mkt_gap_full ");t.b(t.v(t.d("extension.mobileHeadline",c,p,0)));t.b(" mkt_content-wrapper sds_pd_bottom_3xl mkt_hero content_");t.b(t.v(t.d("extension.divPref",c,p,0)));t.b("_");t.b(t.v(t.d("extension.divRank",c,p,0)));t.b("\">");t.b("\n" + i);t.b("  ");t.b("\n" + i);t.b("  <div class=\"sds_relative\">");t.b("\n" + i);t.b("    <!-- Background Image -->");t.b("\n" + i);t.b("    <a href=\"");t.b(t.v(t.d("extension.backgroundLink",c,p,0)));t.b("\" onclick=\"return wcdLib.contentItemLinkWithFacet(this,'','");t.b(t.v(t.d("extension.backgroundTid",c,p,0)));t.b("');\">");t.b("\n" + i);t.b("    <picture class=\"mkt_z--neg\">");t.b("\n" + i);t.b("      <source         var utils = window.optimizely.get('utils');
var thisContentType = extension.divPref + '_' + extension.divRank;
var matchMade = false;
var lazyLoad = false;
var devOnly = false;

console.info('divPref/divRank:' + extension.divPref + '_' + extension.divRank);

//Dev Only
if (location.hostname.indexOf('gidapps') > -1) { 
    extension.unitPlacement = ".mkt_reg-hp--optly3";
    utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
    	if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {
        document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
        var elem = document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement);
        elem.style.cssText = "-webkit-opacity:1;-moz-opacity:1;";     
      }
  	});
}

function deleteContainer(containerClassName){
  utils.waitForElement(containerClassName).then(function(elem) {
    //console.info('removed containerClassName:'+containerClassName);
    if( document.querySelectorAll(containerClassName).length > 0 ) {
      document.querySelector(containerClassName).innerHTML = '';
    }
  });
} 

function lazyLoadExtension(){
 		console.info("lazyLoadExtension found");
    // Pull row name out of unit placement
    var rowPlacement = extension.unitPlacement.split(" ")[0];
    rowPlacement = rowPlacement.substr(1);

    // Has row placement loaded already
    console.log("OPT - lazy load is on for row " + rowPlacement );
    console.log("wcd", window.wcd );
    console.log("flag", window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags.hasOwnProperty ); 

    if( typeof window.wcd !== "undefined" && typeof window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader !== "undefined" && typeof window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags !== "undefined" && window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags.hasOwnProperty( rowPlacement ) == false ) {

      //console.log("container " + rowPlacement + " has not been seen yet “);

jQuery( document ).on("container--" + rowPlacement + ":loaded", function() { //convert to webAPI
            
        utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
          if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {

            console.log("container " + rowPlacement + " event fired, ext added");
          	document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
            var elem = document.querySelector('.'+rowPlacement);
          	elem.style.cssText = "-webkit-opacity:1;-moz-opacity:1;opacity:1;transition:all 1s ease;";
          }
        });
        
      });
    }
    else {

      utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
        if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {
            console.log("container " + rowPlacement + " already seen, ext added");
          	document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
            var elem = document.querySelector('.'+rowPlacement);
          	elem.style.cssText = "-webkit-opacity:1;-moz-opacity:1;opacity:1;transition:all 1s ease;";
        }
      });

    }
}

utils.waitUntil(function() {
  return !!window.wcdLib && ((window.ROW1 && window.ROW1.length > 0 ) || (window.ROW2 && window.ROW2.length > 0 ) || (window.ROW3 && window.ROW3.length > 0));
}).then(function() {
   
  var prefForRow1 = ROW1[1] + '_' + ROW1[2];
  var prefForRow2 = ROW2[1] + '_' + ROW2[2];
  var prefForRow3 = ROW3[1] + '_' + ROW3[2];

  console.info('contentType in Experiment:' + thisContentType);
  console.info('contentType in Controller1: ' + prefForRow1);
  console.info('contentType in Controller2: ' + prefForRow2);
  console.info('contentType in Controller3: ' + prefForRow3);
    
  if (thisContentType == prefForRow1) {
    console.info('Is a match! hook to: .mkt_reg-hp--optly' + window.ROW1[0]);   
    var newRowPlacement = '.mkt_reg-hp--optly'+ window.ROW1[0];
    //remove MCM content of the same container number
    //var containerClassName = '.mkt_reg-hp--c' + window.ROW1[0];
    var containerClassName = '.mkt_reg-hp--c3';
		deleteContainer(containerClassName);
    matchMade = true;
    extension.unitPlacement = newRowPlacement;
    console.info('do not lazy load:' + extension.unitPlacement + ' ' + lazyLoad);
  } 
  else if (thisContentType == prefForRow2) {
    console.info('Is a match! hook to: .mkt_reg-hp--optly' +  window.ROW2[0]); 
    var newRowPlacement = '.mkt_reg-hp--optly'+ window.ROW2[0];
    //remove MCM content of the same container number
    var containerClassName = '.mkt_reg-hp--c' + window.ROW2[0];
		deleteContainer(containerClassName);
    matchMade = true;
    lazyLoad = true;
    extension.unitPlacement = newRowPlacement;
    console.info(extension.unitPlacement);
  }
  else if (thisContentType == prefForRow3) {
    console.info('Is a match! hook to: .mkt_reg-hp--optly' + window.ROW3[0]);  
    var newRowPlacement = '.mkt_reg-hp--optly'+ window.ROW3[0];
     //remove MCM content of the same container number
    var containerClassName = '.mkt_reg-hp--c' + window.ROW3[0];
		deleteContainer(containerClassName);
    matchMade = true;
    lazyLoad = true;
    extension.unitPlacement = newRowPlacement;
    console.info(extension.unitPlacement);
  } else {
  	//no match
    console.info('No Match. Keep it moving...'); 
   // devOnly = true;
  }

if( lazyLoad && matchMade) {
  if (document.attachEvent ? document.readyState === "complete" : document.readyState !== "loading"){
        lazyLoadExtension();
  } else {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', lazyLoadExtension);
  }
} else if ( !lazyLoad && matchMade) { //load immediately, probably can hard code this container
    utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
    if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {
      console.log("lazy load off, ext added for: " + extension.unitPlacement);
      document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
      var elem = document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement);
      elem.style.cssText = "-webkit-opacity:1;-moz-opacity:1;opacity:1;transition:all 1s ease;";     
    }
  });
  
} 
  
  
});





      },
      hideFn: function(event) {
        var $ = window.optimizely.get('jquery');
        var widget = event.data.config;
        widget.$id = "11081911260";
        widget.$instance = event.data.id;
        widget.$fieldDefaults = [{"name":"unitPlacement","default_value":".mkt_reg-hp--optly3"},{"name":"imgLarge","default_value":"//cdn.optimizely.com/img/6529002483/9001ec8323d04cc3b68e0bfede42fdb6.jpg"},{"name":"imgSmall","default_value":"//cdn.optimizely.com/img/6529002483/4960ec66f00e4be0b48a62814b08f8b8.jpg"},{"name":"imgAlt","default_value":""},{"name":"textAlign","default_value":"mkt_txt--left-at-lg"},{"name":"graphic","default_value":""},{"name":"eyebrow","default_value":""},{"name":"headlineStyle","default_value":"mkt_font-size--8vw-at-lg mkt_font-size--136-at-xl .mkt_line-height--0-9"},{"name":"headlineColor","default_value":"rgba(18, 35, 52, 1)"},{"name":"headline","default_value":"New<br class=\"sds_show-at-lg\">\nfor<br class=\"sds_show-at-lg\">\nyou"},{"name":"mobileHeadlineColor","default_value":"rgba(18, 35, 52, 1)"},{"name":"mobileHeadline","default_value":"mkt_mobile_headline_under"},{"name":"bodyColor","default_value":"rgba(18, 35, 68, 1)"},{"name":"body","default_value":"Our high rise skinny is now<br class=\"sds_show-at-lg\">more flattering than ever.         (function(widg) {

    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];

        var extension = widget;

                  extension: extension
                  });
        jQuery('body').append(html);

        jQuery('.details-optly-modal-background, .details-optly-modal-close').bind('click', function() {
        jQuery('.details-optly-modal-background').css("display", "none");
        jQuery('.universal-modal--backdrop').css("display", "none");
        jQuery('.details-optly-modal').css("display", "none");
      });
    });
});


  
      },

    }

function insertAfter(newNode, referenceNode) {
    referenceNode.parentNode.insertBefore(newNode, referenceNode.nextSibling);
}

        var utils = window.optimizely.get('utils');
var thisContentType = extension.divPref + '_' + extension.divRank;
var matchMade = false;
var lazyLoad = false;
var devOnly = false;

console.info('divPref/divRank:' + extension.divPref + '_' + extension.divRank);

//Dev Only
if (location.hostname.indexOf('gidapps') > -1) { 
    extension.unitPlacement = ".mkt_reg-hp--optly3";
    utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
    	if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {
        document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
        var elem = document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement);
        elem.style.cssText = "-webkit-opacity:1;-moz-opacity:1;";     
      }
  	});
}
function deleteContainer(containerClassName){
  utils.waitForElement(containerClassName).then(function(elem) {
    //console.info('removed containerClassName:'+containerClassName);
    if( document.querySelectorAll(containerClassName).length > 0 ) {
      document.querySelector(containerClassName).innerHTML = '';
    }
  });
} 

function lazyLoadExtension(){
 		console.info("lazyLoadExtension found");
    // Pull row name out of unit placement
    var rowPlacement = extension.unitPlacement.split(" ")[0];
    rowPlacement = rowPlacement.substr(1);

    // Has row placement loaded already
    console.log("OPT - lazy load is on for row " + rowPlacement );
    console.log("wcd", window.wcd );
    console.log("flag", window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags.hasOwnProperty ); 

    if( typeof window.wcd !== "undefined" && typeof window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader !== "undefined" && typeof window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags !== "undefined" && window.wcd.ContentLazyLoader.hpDpLoadedFlags.hasOwnProperty( rowPlacement ) == false ) {

      //console.log("container " + rowPlacement + " has not been seen yet “);

jQuery( document ).on("container--" + rowPlacement + ":loaded", function() { //convert to webAPI
            
        utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
          if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {

            console.log("container " + rowPlacement + " event fired, ext added");
          	document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
            var elem = document.querySelector('.'+rowPlacement);
          	elem.style.cssText = "-webkit-opacity:1;-moz-opacity:1;opacity:1;transition:all 1s ease;";
          }
        });
        
      });
    }
    else {

      utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
        if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {
            console.log("container " + rowPlacement + " already seen, ext added");
          	document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
            var elem = document.querySelector('.'+rowPlacement);
          	elem.style.cssText = "-webkit-opacity:1;-moz-opacity:1;opacity:1;transition:all 1s ease;";
        }
      });

    }
}

utils.waitUntil(function() {
  return !!window.wcdLib && ((window.ROW1 && window.ROW1.length > 0 ) || (window.ROW2 && window.ROW2.length > 0 ) || (window.ROW3 && window.ROW3.length > 0));
}).then(function() {

  var prefForRow1 = ROW1[1] + '_' + ROW1[2];
  var prefForRow2 = ROW2[1] + '_' + ROW2[2];
  var prefForRow3 = ROW3[1] + '_' + ROW3[2];

  console.info('contentType in Experiment:' + thisContentType);
  console.info('contentType in Controller1: ' + prefForRow1);
  console.info('contentType in Controller2: ' + prefForRow2);
  console.info('contentType in Controller3: ' + prefForRow3);
    
  if (thisContentType == prefForRow1) {
    console.info('Is a match! hook to: .mkt_reg-hp--optly' + window.ROW1[0]);   
    var newRowPlacement = '.mkt_reg-hp--optly'+ window.ROW1[0];
    //remove MCM content of the same container number
    //var containerClassName = '.mkt_reg-hp--c' + window.ROW1[0];
    var containerClassName = '.mkt_reg-hp--c3';
		deleteContainer(containerClassName);
    matchMade = true;
    extension.unitPlacement = newRowPlacement;
    console.info('do not lazy load:' + extension.unitPlacement + ' ' + lazyLoad);
  } 
  else if (thisContentType == prefForRow2) {
    console.info('Is a match! hook to: .mkt_reg-hp--optly' +  window.ROW2[0]); 
    var newRowPlacement = '.mkt_reg-hp--optly'+ window.ROW2[0];
    //remove MCM content of the same container number
    var containerClassName = '.mkt_reg-hp--c' + window.ROW2[0];
		deleteContainer(containerClassName);
    matchMade = true;
    lazyLoad = true;
    extension.unitPlacement = newRowPlacement;
    console.info(extension.unitPlacement);
  }
  else if (thisContentType == prefForRow3) {
    console.info('Is a match! hook to: .mkt_reg-hp--optly' + window.ROW3[0]);  
    var newRowPlacement = '.mkt_reg-hp--optly'+ window.ROW3[0];
     //remove MCM content of the same container number
    var containerClassName = '.mkt_reg-hp--c' + window.ROW3[0];
		deleteContainer(containerClassName);
    matchMade = true;
    lazyLoad = true;
    extension.unitPlacement = newRowPlacement;
    console.info(extension.unitPlacement);
  } else {
  	//no match
    console.info('No Match. Keep it moving...'); 
  }

if( lazyLoad && matchMade) {
  if (document.attachEvent ? document.readyState === "complete" : document.readyState !== "loading"){
        lazyLoadExtension();
  } else {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', lazyLoadExtension);
  }
} else if ( !lazyLoad && matchMade) { //load immediately, probably can hard code this container
    utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
    if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {
      console.log("lazy load off, ext added for: " + extension.unitPlacement);
      document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
      var elem = document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement);
      elem.style.cssText = "-webkit-opacity:1;-moz-opacity:1;opacity:1;transition:all 1s ease;";     
    }
  });
  
} else if (devOnly) {
    //dev only
  	extension.unitPlacement = ".mkt_reg-hp--optly1";
    utils.waitForElement(extension.unitPlacement).then(function(elem) {
    if( document.querySelectorAll('#optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance).length < 1 ) {
        document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement).insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', extension.$html);
        var elem = document.querySelector(extension.unitPlacement);
        elem.style.cssText = "-webkit-opacity:1;-moz-opacity:1;";     
      }
  });

}
  
  
});

      },
      hideFn: function(event) {
        var $ = window.optimizely.get('jquery');
        var widget = event.data.config;
        widget.$id = "11152350010";
        widget.$instance = event.data.id;
        widget.$fieldDefaults = [{"name":"unitPlacement","default_value":".mkt_reg-hp--optly3"},{"name":"imgLarge","default_value":"//cdn.optimizely.com/img/6529002483/9001ec8323d04cc3b68e0bfede42fdb6.jpg"},{"name":"imgSmall","default_value":"//cdn.optimizely.com/img/6529002483/4960ec66f00e4be0b48a62814b08f8b8.jpg"},{"name":"imgAlt","default_value":""},{"name":"svgLarge","default_value":""},{"name":"svgSmall","default_value":""},{"name":"ctaAlign","default_value":"transform:translateY(-50%); -webkit-transform:translateY(-50%); left"},{"name":"leftPosition","default_value":"6"},{"name":"topPosition","default_value":"70"},{"name":"ctaStyle","default_value":"sds_font--maax-medium sds_btn--color-bk sds_letter-spacing--1-0 sds_pd_left_lg sds_pd_right_lg"},{"name":"backgroundLink","default_value":"/"},{"name":"backgroundTid","default_value":""},{"name":"cta1","default_value":"Men"},{"name":"cta1Link","default_value":"/"},{"name":"cta1Tid","default_value":""},{"name":"cta2","default_value":"Women"},{"name":"cta2Link","default_value":"/"},{"name":"cta2Tid","default_value":""},{"name":"cta3","default_value":"Toddler Girl"},{"name":"cta3Link","default_value":"/"},{"name":"cta3Tid","default_value":""},{"name":"cta4","default_value":"Baby"},{"name":"cta4Link","default_value":"/"},{"name":"cta4Tid","default_value":""},{"name":"detailsText","default_value":""},{"name":"detailsLink","default_value":""},{"name":"detailsColor","default_value":"sds_color--bk"},{"name":"divPref","default_value":"NONE"},{"name":"divRank","default_value":""}];
        (function(widg) {
  var i = 0;
  var field;
  for (; i < widg.$fieldDefaults.length; ++i) {
    field = widg.$fieldDefaults[i];
    if (!widg.hasOwnProperty(field.name)) {
      widg[field.name] = field.default_value;
    }
  }
  })(widget);
        var extension = widget;
        widget._styleTag = document.getElementById('widget-css-11152350010');
if (widget._styleTag) widget._styleTag.parentNode.removeChild(widget._styleTag);
        var extensionHtml = document.getElementById('optimizely-extension-' + extension.$instance);

PluginManager.registerWidget({
      widgetId: '11495520207',
      showFn: function(event) {
